GP10bhp_04u:238: BhP_04.03.008/1 prajāpates te śvaśurasya sāmprataṃ niryāpito yajña-mahotsavaḥ kila
GP10bhp_04u:239: BhP_04.03.008/2 vayaṃ ca tatrābhisarāma vāma te yady arthitāmī vibudhā vrajanti hi
GP10bhp_04u:240: BhP_04.03.009/1 tasmin bhaginyo mama bhartṛbhiḥ svakair dhruvaṃ gamiṣyanti suhṛd-didṛkṣavaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:241: BhP_04.03.009/2 ahaṃ ca tasmin bhavatābhikāmaye sahopanītaṃ paribarham arhitum
GP10bhp_04u:242: BhP_04.03.010/1 tatra svasṝr me nanu bhartṛ-sammitā mātṛ-ṣvasṝḥ klinna-dhiyaṃ ca mātaram
GP10bhp_04u:243: BhP_04.03.010/2 drakṣye cirotkaṇṭha-manā maharṣibhir unnīyamānaṃ ca mṛḍādhvara-dhvajam
GP10bhp_04u:244: BhP_04.03.011/1 tvayy etad āścaryam ajātma-māyayā vinirmitaṃ bhāti guṇa-trayātmakam
GP10bhp_04u:245: BhP_04.03.011/2 tathāpy ahaṃ yoṣid atattva-vic ca te dīnā didṛkṣe bhava me bhava-kṣitim
GP10bhp_04u:246: BhP_04.03.012/1 paśya prayāntīr abhavānya-yoṣito 'py alaṅkṛtāḥ kānta-sakhā varūthaśaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:247: BhP_04.03.012/2 yāsāṃ vrajadbhiḥ śiti-kaṇṭha maṇḍitaṃ nabho vimānaiḥ kala-haṃsa-pāṇḍubhiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:248: BhP_04.03.013/1 kathaṃ sutāyāḥ pitṛ-geha-kautukaṃ niśamya dehaḥ sura-varya neṅgate
GP10bhp_04u:249: BhP_04.03.013/2 anāhutā apy abhiyanti sauhṛdaṃ bhartur guror deha-kṛtaś ca ketanam
GP10bhp_04u:250: BhP_04.03.014/1 tan me prasīdedam amartya vāñchitaṃ kartuṃ bhavān kāruṇiko batārhati
GP10bhp_04u:251: BhP_04.03.014/2 tvayātmano 'rdhe 'ham adabhra-cakṣuṣā nirūpitā mānugṛhāṇa yācitaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:253: BhP_04.03.015/1 evaṃ giritraḥ priyayābhibhāṣitaḥ pratyabhyadhatta prahasan suhṛt-priyaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:254: BhP_04.03.015/2 saṃsmārito marma-bhidaḥ kuvāg-iṣūn yān āha ko viśva-sṛjāṃ samakṣataḥ
GP10bhp_04u:256: BhP_04.03.016/1 tvayoditaṃ śobhanam eva śobhane anāhutā apy abhiyanti bandhuṣu
GP10bhp_04u:257: BhP_04.03.016/2 te yady anutpādita-doṣa-dṛṣṭayo balīyasānātmya-madena manyunā
GP10bhp_04u:258: BhP_04.03.017/1 vidyā-tapo-vitta-vapur-vayaḥ-kulaiḥ satāṃ guṇaiḥ ṣaḍbhir asattametaraiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:259: BhP_04.03.017/2 smṛtau hatāyāṃ bhṛta-māna-durdṛśaḥ stabdhā na paśyanti hi dhāma bhūyasām
GP10bhp_04u:260: BhP_04.03.018/1 naitādṛśānāṃ sva-jana-vyapekṣayā gṛhān pratīyād anavasthitātmanām
GP10bhp_04u:262: BhP_04.03.019/1 tathāribhir na vyathate śilīmukhaiḥ śete 'rditāṅgo hṛdayena dūyatā
GP10bhp_04u:263: BhP_04.03.019/2 svānāṃ yathā vakra-dhiyāṃ duruktibhir divā-niśaṃ tapyati marma-tāḍitaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:264: BhP_04.03.020/1 vyaktaṃ tvam utkṛṣṭa-gateḥ prajāpateḥ priyātmajānām asi subhru me matā
GP10bhp_04u:265: BhP_04.03.020/2 tathāpi mānaṃ na pituḥ prapatsyase mad-āśrayāt kaḥ paritapyate yataḥ
GP10bhp_04u:267: BhP_04.03.021/2 akalpa eṣām adhiroḍhum añjasā paraṃ padaṃ dveṣṭi yathāsurā harim
GP10bhp_04u:268: BhP_04.03.022/1 pratyudgama-praśrayaṇābhivādanaṃ vidhīyate sādhu mithaḥ sumadhyame
GP10bhp_04u:269: BhP_04.03.022/2 prājñaiḥ parasmai puruṣāya cetasā guhā-śayāyaiva na deha-mānine
GP10bhp_04u:270: BhP_04.03.023/1 sattvaṃ viśuddhaṃ vasudeva-śabditaṃ yad īyate tatra pumān apāvṛtaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:271: BhP_04.03.023/2 sattve ca tasmin bhagavān vāsudevo hy adhokṣajo me namasā vidhīyate
GP10bhp_04u:272: BhP_04.03.024/1 tat te nirīkṣyo na pitāpi deha-kṛd dakṣo mama dviṭ tad-anuvratāś ca ye
GP10bhp_04u:273: BhP_04.03.024/2 yo viśvasṛg-yajña-gataṃ varoru mām anāgasaṃ durvacasākarot tiraḥ
GP10bhp_04u:274: BhP_04.03.025/1 yadi vrajiṣyasy atihāya mad-vaco bhadraṃ bhavatyā na tato bhaviṣyati
GP10bhp_04u:275: BhP_04.03.025/2 sambhāvitasya sva-janāt parābhavo yadā sa sadyo maraṇāya kalpate
GP10bhp_04u:277: BhP_04.04.001/1 etāvad uktvā virarāma śaṅkaraḥ patny-aṅga-nāśaṃ hy ubhayatra cintayan
GP10bhp_04u:278: BhP_04.04.001/2 suhṛd-didṛkṣuḥ pariśaṅkitā bhavān niṣkrāmatī nirviśatī dvidhāsa sā
GP10bhp_04u:280: BhP_04.04.002/2 bhavaṃ bhavāny apratipūruṣaṃ ruṣā pradhakṣyatīvaikṣata jāta-vepathuḥ
GP10bhp_04u:281: BhP_04.04.003/1 tato viniḥśvasya satī vihāya taṃ śokena roṣeṇa ca dūyatā hṛdā
GP10bhp_04u:282: BhP_04.04.003/2 pitror agāt straiṇa-vimūḍha-dhīr gṛhān premṇātmano yo 'rdham adāt satāṃ priyaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:283: BhP_04.04.004/1 tām anvagacchan druta-vikramāṃ satīm ekāṃ tri-netrānucarāḥ sahasraśaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:284: BhP_04.04.004/2 sa-pārṣada-yakṣā maṇiman-madādayaḥ puro-vṛṣendrās tarasā gata-vyathāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:286: BhP_04.04.005/2 gītāyanair dundubhi-śaṅkha-veṇubhir vṛṣendram āropya viṭaṅkitā yayuḥ
GP10bhp_04u:287: BhP_04.04.006/1 ābrahma-ghoṣorjita-yajña-vaiśasaṃ viprarṣi-juṣṭaṃ vibudhaiś ca sarvaśaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:289: BhP_04.04.007/1 tām āgatāṃ tatra na kaścanādriyad vimānitāṃ yajña-kṛto bhayāj janaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:290: BhP_04.04.007/2 ṛte svasṝr vai jananīṃ ca sādarāḥ premāśru-kaṇṭhyaḥ pariṣasvajur mudā
GP10bhp_04u:291: BhP_04.04.008/1 saudarya-sampraśna-samartha-vārtayā mātrā ca mātṛ-ṣvasṛbhiś ca sādaram
GP10bhp_04u:292: BhP_04.04.008/2 dattāṃ saparyāṃ varam āsanaṃ ca sā nādatta pitrāpratinanditā satī
GP10bhp_04u:293: BhP_04.04.009/1 arudra-bhāgaṃ tam avekṣya cādhvaraṃ pitrā ca deve kṛta-helanaṃ vibhau
GP10bhp_04u:294: BhP_04.04.009/2 anādṛtā yajña-sadasy adhīśvarī cukopa lokān iva dhakṣyatī ruṣā
GP10bhp_04u:295: BhP_04.04.010/1 jagarha sāmarṣa-vipannayā girā śiva-dviṣaṃ dhūma-patha-śrama-smayam
GP10bhp_04u:296: BhP_04.04.010/2 sva-tejasā bhūta-gaṇān samutthitān nigṛhya devī jagato 'bhiśṛṇvataḥ
GP10bhp_04u:298: BhP_04.04.011/1 na yasya loke 'sty atiśāyanaḥ priyas tathāpriyo deha-bhṛtāṃ priyātmanaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:299: BhP_04.04.011/2 tasmin samastātmani mukta-vairake ṛte bhavantaṃ katamaḥ pratīpayet
GP10bhp_04u:300: BhP_04.04.012/1 doṣān pareṣāṃ hi guṇeṣu sādhavo gṛhṇanti kecin na bhavādṛśo dvija
GP10bhp_04u:301: BhP_04.04.012/2 guṇāṃś ca phalgūn bahulī-kariṣṇavo mahattamās teṣv avidad bhavān agham
GP10bhp_04u:302: BhP_04.04.013/1 nāścaryam etad yad asatsu sarvadā mahad-vinindā kuṇapātma-vādiṣu
GP10bhp_04u:303: BhP_04.04.013/2 serṣyaṃ mahāpūruṣa-pāda-pāṃsubhir nirasta-tejaḥsu tad eva śobhanam
GP10bhp_04u:304: BhP_04.04.014/1 yad dvy-akṣaraṃ nāma gireritaṃ nṛṇāṃ sakṛt prasaṅgād agham āśu hanti tat
GP10bhp_04u:305: BhP_04.04.014/2 pavitra-kīrtiṃ tam alaṅghya-śāsanaṃ bhavān aho dveṣṭi śivaṃ śivetaraḥ
GP10bhp_04u:306: BhP_04.04.015/1 yat-pāda-padmaṃ mahatāṃ mano-'libhir niṣevitaṃ brahma-rasāsavārthibhiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:307: BhP_04.04.015/2 lokasya yad varṣati cāśiṣo 'rthinas tasmai bhavān druhyati viśva-bandhave
GP10bhp_04u:308: BhP_04.04.016/1 kiṃ vā śivākhyam aśivaṃ na vidus tvad anye brahmādayas tam avakīrya jaṭāḥ śmaśāne
GP10bhp_04u:309: BhP_04.04.016/2 tan-mālya-bhasma-nṛkapāly avasat piśācair ye mūrdhabhir dadhati tac-caraṇāvasṛṣṭam
GP10bhp_04u:310: BhP_04.04.017/1 karṇau pidhāya nirayād yad akalpa īśe dharmāvitary asṛṇibhir nṛbhir asyamāne
GP10bhp_04u:311: BhP_04.04.017/2 chindyāt prasahya ruśatīm asatīṃ prabhuś cej jihvām asūn api tato visṛjet sa dharmaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:312: BhP_04.04.018/1 atas tavotpannam idaṃ kalevaraṃ na dhārayiṣye śiti-kaṇṭha-garhiṇaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:313: BhP_04.04.018/2 jagdhasya mohād dhi viśuddhim andhaso jugupsitasyoddharaṇaṃ pracakṣate
GP10bhp_04u:314: BhP_04.04.019/1 na veda-vādān anuvartate matiḥ sva eva loke ramato mahā-muneḥ
GP10bhp_04u:315: BhP_04.04.019/2 yathā gatir deva-manuṣyayoḥ pṛthak sva eva dharme na paraṃ kṣipet sthitaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:316: BhP_04.04.020/1 karma pravṛttaṃ ca nivṛttam apy ṛtaṃ vede vivicyobhaya-liṅgam āśritam
GP10bhp_04u:317: BhP_04.04.020/2 virodhi tad yaugapadaika-kartari dvayaṃ tathā brahmaṇi karma narcchati
GP10bhp_04u:318: BhP_04.04.021/1 mā vaḥ padavyaḥ pitar asmad-āsthitā yā yajña-śālāsu na dhūma-vartmabhiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:319: BhP_04.04.021/2 tad-anna-tṛptair asu-bhṛdbhir īḍitā avyakta-liṅgā avadhūta-sevitāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:320: BhP_04.04.022/1 naitena dehena hare kṛtāgaso dehodbhavenālam alaṃ kujanmanā
GP10bhp_04u:321: BhP_04.04.022/2 vrīḍā mamābhūt kujana-prasaṅgatas taj janma dhig yo mahatām avadya-kṛt
GP10bhp_04u:322: BhP_04.04.023/1 gotraṃ tvadīyaṃ bhagavān vṛṣadhvajo dākṣāyaṇīty āha yadā sudurmanāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:323: BhP_04.04.023/2 vyapeta-narma-smitam āśu tadāhaṃ vyutsrakṣya etat kuṇapaṃ tvad-aṅgajam
GP10bhp_04u:325: BhP_04.04.024/1 ity adhvare dakṣam anūdya śatru-han kṣitāv udīcīṃ niṣasāda śānta-vāk
GP10bhp_04u:326: BhP_04.04.024/2 spṛṣṭvā jalaṃ pīta-dukūla-saṃvṛtā nimīlya dṛg yoga-pathaṃ samāviśat
GP10bhp_04u:327: BhP_04.04.025/1 kṛtvā samānāv anilau jitāsanā sodānam utthāpya ca nābhi-cakrataḥ
GP10bhp_04u:328: BhP_04.04.025/2 śanair hṛdi sthāpya dhiyorasi sthitaṃ kaṇṭhād bhruvor madhyam aninditānayat
GP10bhp_04u:329: BhP_04.04.026/1 evaṃ sva-dehaṃ mahatāṃ mahīyasā muhuḥ samāropitam aṅkam ādarāt
GP10bhp_04u:330: BhP_04.04.026/2 jihāsatī dakṣa-ruṣā manasvinī dadhāra gātreṣv anilāgni-dhāraṇām
GP10bhp_04u:331: BhP_04.04.027/1 tataḥ sva-bhartuś caraṇāmbujāsavaṃ jagad-guroś cintayatī na cāparam
GP10bhp_04u:332: BhP_04.04.027/2 dadarśa deho hata-kalmaṣaḥ satī sadyaḥ prajajvāla samādhijāgninā
GP10bhp_04u:333: BhP_04.04.028/1 tat paśyatāṃ khe bhuvi cādbhutaṃ mahad hā heti vādaḥ sumahān ajāyata
GP10bhp_04u:334: BhP_04.04.028/2 hanta priyā daivatamasya devī jahāv asūn kena satī prakopitā
GP10bhp_04u:335: BhP_04.04.029/1 aho anātmyaṃ mahad asya paśyata prajāpater yasya carācaraṃ prajāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:336: BhP_04.04.029/2 jahāv asūn yad-vimatātmajā satī manasvinī mānam abhīkṣṇam arhati
GP10bhp_04u:337: BhP_04.04.030/1 so 'yaṃ durmarṣa-hṛdayo brahma-dhruk ca loke 'pakīrtiṃ mahatīm avāpsyati
GP10bhp_04u:338: BhP_04.04.030/2 yad-aṅgajāṃ svāṃ puruṣa-dviḍ udyatāṃ na pratyaṣedhan mṛtaye 'parādhataḥ
GP10bhp_04u:339: BhP_04.04.031/1 vadaty evaṃ jane satyā dṛṣṭvāsu-tyāgam adbhutam
GP10bhp_04u:340: BhP_04.04.031/2 dakṣaṃ tat-pārṣadā hantum udatiṣṭhann udāyudhāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:341: BhP_04.04.032/1 teṣām āpatatāṃ vegaṃ niśāmya bhagavān bhṛguḥ
GP10bhp_04u:342: BhP_04.04.032/2 yajña-ghna-ghnena yajuṣā dakṣiṇāgnau juhāva ha
GP10bhp_04u:343: BhP_04.04.033/1 adhvaryuṇā hūyamāne devā utpetur ojasā
GP10bhp_04u:344: BhP_04.04.033/2 ṛbhavo nāma tapasā somaṃ prāptāḥ sahasraśaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:345: BhP_04.04.034/1 tair alātāyudhaiḥ sarve pramathāḥ saha-guhyakāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:346: BhP_04.04.034/2 hanyamānā diśo bhejur uśadbhir brahma-tejasā
GP10bhp_04u:348: BhP_04.05.001/1 bhavo bhavānyā nidhanaṃ prajāpater asat-kṛtāyā avagamya nāradāt
GP10bhp_04u:349: BhP_04.05.001/2 sva-pārṣada-sainyaṃ ca tad-adhvararbhubhir vidrāvitaṃ krodham apāram ādadhe
GP10bhp_04u:350: BhP_04.05.002/1 kruddhaḥ sudaṣṭauṣṭha-puṭaḥ sa dhūr-jaṭir jaṭāṃ taḍid-vahni-saṭogra-rociṣam
GP10bhp_04u:351: BhP_04.05.002/2 utkṛtya rudraḥ sahasotthito hasan gambhīra-nādo visasarja tāṃ bhuvi
GP10bhp_04u:352: BhP_04.05.003/1 tato 'tikāyas tanuvā spṛśan divaṃ sahasra-bāhur ghana-ruk tri-sūrya-dṛk
GP10bhp_04u:354: BhP_04.05.004/1 taṃ kiṃ karomīti gṛṇantam āha baddhāñjaliṃ bhagavān bhūta-nāthaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:355: BhP_04.05.004/2 dakṣaṃ sa-yajñaṃ jahi mad-bhaṭānāṃ tvam agraṇī rudra bhaṭāṃśako me
GP10bhp_04u:356: BhP_04.05.005/1 ājñapta evaṃ kupitena manyunā sa deva-devaṃ paricakrame vibhum
GP10bhp_04u:357: BhP_04.05.005/2 mene-tadātmānam asaṅga-raṃhasā mahīyasāṃ tāta sahaḥ sahiṣṇum
GP10bhp_04u:358: BhP_04.05.006/1 anvīyamānaḥ sa tu rudra-pārṣadair bhṛśaṃ nadadbhir vyanadat subhairavam
GP10bhp_04u:359: BhP_04.05.006/2 udyamya śūlaṃ jagad-antakāntakaṃ samprādravad ghoṣaṇa-bhūṣaṇāṅghriḥ
GP10bhp_04u:360: BhP_04.05.007/1 athartvijo yajamānaḥ sadasyāḥ kakubhy udīcyāṃ prasamīkṣya reṇum
GP10bhp_04u:361: BhP_04.05.007/2 tamaḥ kim etat kuta etad rajo 'bhūd iti dvijā dvija-patnyaś ca dadhyuḥ
GP10bhp_04u:362: BhP_04.05.008/1 vātā na vānti na hi santi dasyavaḥ prācīna-barhir jīvati hogra-daṇḍaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:363: BhP_04.05.008/2 gāvo na kālyanta idaṃ kuto rajo loko 'dhunā kiṃ pralayāya kalpate
GP10bhp_04u:364: BhP_04.05.009/1 prasūti-miśrāḥ striya udvigna-cittā ūcur vipāko vṛjinasyaiva tasya
GP10bhp_04u:365: BhP_04.05.009/2 yat paśyantīnāṃ duhitṝṇāṃ prajeśaḥ sutāṃ satīm avadadhyāv anāgām
GP10bhp_04u:366: BhP_04.05.010/1 yas tv anta-kāle vyupta-jaṭā-kalāpaḥ sva-śūla-sūcy-arpita-dig-gajendraḥ
GP10bhp_04u:368: BhP_04.05.011/1 amarṣayitvā tam asahya-tejasaṃ manyu-plutaṃ durnirīkṣyaṃ bhru-kuṭyā
GP10bhp_04u:369: BhP_04.05.011/2 karāla-daṃṣṭrābhir udasta-bhāgaṇaṃ syāt svasti kiṃ kopayato vidhātuḥ
GP10bhp_04u:370: BhP_04.05.012/1 bahv evam udvigna-dṛśocyamāne janena dakṣasya muhur mahātmanaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:371: BhP_04.05.012/2 utpetur utpātatamāḥ sahasraśo bhayāvahā divi bhūmau ca paryak
GP10bhp_04u:372: BhP_04.05.013/1 tāvat sa rudrānucarair mahā-makho nānāyudhair vāmanakair udāyudhaiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:373: BhP_04.05.013/2 piṅgaiḥ piśaṅgair makarodarānanaiḥ paryādravadbhir vidurānvarudhyata
GP10bhp_04u:374: BhP_04.05.014/1 kecid babhañjuḥ prāg-vaṃśaṃ patnī-śālāṃ tathāpare
GP10bhp_04u:375: BhP_04.05.014/2 sada āgnīdhra-śālāṃ ca tad-vihāraṃ mahānasam
GP10bhp_04u:377: BhP_04.05.015/2 kuṇḍeṣv amūtrayan kecid bibhidur vedi-mekhalāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:378: BhP_04.05.016/1 abādhanta munīn anye eke patnīr atarjayan
GP10bhp_04u:379: BhP_04.05.016/2 apare jagṛhur devān pratyāsannān palāyitān
GP10bhp_04u:380: BhP_04.05.017/1 bhṛguṃ babandha maṇimān vīrabhadraḥ prajāpatim
GP10bhp_04u:381: BhP_04.05.017/2 caṇḍeśaḥ pūṣaṇaṃ devaṃ bhagaṃ nandīśvaro 'grahīt
GP10bhp_04u:382: BhP_04.05.018/1 sarva evartvijo dṛṣṭvā sadasyāḥ sa-divaukasaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:383: BhP_04.05.018/2 tair ardyamānāḥ subhṛśaṃ grāvabhir naikadhādravan
GP10bhp_04u:384: BhP_04.05.019/1 juhvataḥ sruva-hastasya śmaśrūṇi bhagavān bhavaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:385: BhP_04.05.019/2 bhṛgor luluñce sadasi yo 'hasac chmaśru darśayan
GP10bhp_04u:386: BhP_04.05.020/1 bhagasya netre bhagavān pātitasya ruṣā bhuvi
GP10bhp_04u:387: BhP_04.05.020/2 ujjahāra sada-stho 'kṣṇā yaḥ śapantam asūsucat
GP10bhp_04u:388: BhP_04.05.021/1 pūṣṇo hy apātayad dantān kāliṅgasya yathā balaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:389: BhP_04.05.021/2 śapyamāne garimaṇi yo 'hasad darśayan dataḥ
GP10bhp_04u:391: BhP_04.05.022/2 chindann api tad uddhartuṃ nāśaknot tryambakas tadā
GP10bhp_04u:392: BhP_04.05.023/1 śastrair astrānvitair evam anirbhinna-tvacaṃ haraḥ
GP10bhp_04u:393: BhP_04.05.023/2 vismayaṃ param āpanno dadhyau paśupatiś ciram
GP10bhp_04u:394: BhP_04.05.024/1 dṛṣṭvā saṃjñapanaṃ yogaṃ paśūnāṃ sa patir makhe
GP10bhp_04u:395: BhP_04.05.024/2 yajamāna-paśoḥ kasya kāyāt tenāharac chiraḥ
GP10bhp_04u:396: BhP_04.05.025/1 sādhu-vādas tadā teṣāṃ karma tat tasya paśyatām
GP10bhp_04u:398: BhP_04.05.026/1 juhāvaitac chiras tasmin dakṣiṇāgnāv amarṣitaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:401: BhP_04.06.001/1 atha deva-gaṇāḥ sarve rudrānīkaiḥ parājitāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:406: BhP_04.06.003/2 nārāyaṇaś ca viśvātmā na kasyādhvaram īyatuḥ
GP10bhp_04u:407: BhP_04.06.004/1 tad ākarṇya vibhuḥ prāha tejīyasi kṛtāgasi
GP10bhp_04u:408: BhP_04.06.004/2 kṣemāya tatra sā bhūyān na prāyeṇa bubhūṣatām
GP10bhp_04u:409: BhP_04.06.005/1 athāpi yūyaṃ kṛta-kilbiṣā bhavaṃ ye barhiṣo bhāga-bhājaṃ parāduḥ
GP10bhp_04u:411: BhP_04.06.006/1 āśāsānā jīvitam adhvarasya lokaḥ sa-pālaḥ kupite na yasmin
GP10bhp_04u:412: BhP_04.06.006/2 tam āśu devaṃ priyayā vihīnaṃ kṣamāpayadhvaṃ hṛdi viddhaṃ duruktaiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:413: BhP_04.06.007/1 nāhaṃ na yajño na ca yūyam anye ye deha-bhājo munayaś ca tattvam
GP10bhp_04u:414: BhP_04.06.007/2 viduḥ pramāṇaṃ bala-vīryayor vā yasyātma-tantrasya ka upāyaṃ vidhitset
GP10bhp_04u:415: BhP_04.06.008/1 sa ittham ādiśya surān ajas tu taiḥ samanvitaḥ pitṛbhiḥ sa-prajeśaiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:416: BhP_04.06.008/2 yayau sva-dhiṣṇyān nilayaṃ pura-dviṣaḥ kailāsam adri-pravaraṃ priyaṃ prabhoḥ
GP10bhp_04u:418: BhP_04.06.009/2 juṣṭaṃ kinnara-gandharvair apsarobhir vṛtaṃ sadā
GP10bhp_04u:424: BhP_04.06.012/2 plāvitai rakta-kaṇṭhānāṃ kūjitaiś ca patattriṇām
GP10bhp_04u:425: BhP_04.06.013/1 āhvayantam ivoddhastair dvijān kāma-dughair drumaiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:426: BhP_04.06.013/2 vrajantam iva mātaṅgair gṛṇantam iva nirjharaiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:427: BhP_04.06.014/1 mandāraiḥ pārijātaiś ca saralaiś copaśobhitam
GP10bhp_04u:429: BhP_04.06.015/1 cūtaiḥ kadambair nīpaiś ca nāga-punnāga-campakaiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:432: BhP_04.06.016/2 kubjakair mallikābhiś ca mādhavībhiś ca maṇḍitam
GP10bhp_04u:434: BhP_04.06.017/2 bhūrjair oṣadhibhiḥ pūgai rājapūgaiś ca jambubhiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:436: BhP_04.06.018/2 druma-jātibhir anyaiś ca rājitaṃ veṇu-kīcakaiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:439: BhP_04.06.020/1 mṛgaiḥ śākhāmṛgaiḥ kroḍair mṛgendrair ṛkṣa-śalyakaiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:440: BhP_04.06.020/2 gavayaiḥ śarabhair vyāghrai rurubhir mahiṣādibhiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:444: BhP_04.06.022/2 vilokya bhūteśa-giriṃ vibudhā vismayaṃ yayuḥ
GP10bhp_04u:445: BhP_04.06.023/1 dadṛśus tatra te ramyām alakāṃ nāma vai purīm
GP10bhp_04u:446: BhP_04.06.023/2 vanaṃ saugandhikaṃ cāpi yatra tan-nāma paṅkajam
GP10bhp_04u:447: BhP_04.06.024/1 nandā cālakanandā ca saritau bāhyataḥ puraḥ
GP10bhp_04u:449: BhP_04.06.025/1 yayoḥ sura-striyaḥ kṣattar avaruhya sva-dhiṣṇyataḥ
GP10bhp_04u:450: BhP_04.06.025/2 krīḍanti puṃsaḥ siñcantyo vigāhya rati-karśitāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:452: BhP_04.06.026/2 vitṛṣo 'pi pibanty ambhaḥ pāyayanto gajā gajīḥ
GP10bhp_04u:454: BhP_04.06.027/2 juṣṭāṃ puṇyajana-strībhir yathā khaṃ sataḍid-ghanam
GP10bhp_04u:455: BhP_04.06.028/1 hitvā yakṣeśvara-purīṃ vanaṃ saugandhikaṃ ca tat
GP10bhp_04u:460: BhP_04.06.030/2 adhi puṇyajana-strīṇāṃ muhur unmathayan manaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:462: BhP_04.06.031/2 prāptaṃ kimpuruṣair dṛṣṭvā ta ārād dadṛśur vaṭam
GP10bhp_04u:466: BhP_04.06.033/2 dadṛśuḥ śivam āsīnaṃ tyaktāmarṣam ivāntakam
GP10bhp_04u:468: BhP_04.06.034/2 upāsyamānaṃ sakhyā ca bhartrā guhyaka-rakṣasām
GP10bhp_04u:472: BhP_04.06.036/2 aṅgena sandhyābhra-rucā candra-lekhāṃ ca bibhratam
GP10bhp_04u:473: BhP_04.06.037/1 upaviṣṭaṃ darbhamayyāṃ bṛsyāṃ brahma sanātanam
GP10bhp_04u:474: BhP_04.06.037/2 nāradāya pravocantaṃ pṛcchate śṛṇvatāṃ satām
GP10bhp_04u:475: BhP_04.06.038/1 kṛtvorau dakṣiṇe savyaṃ pāda-padmaṃ ca jānuni
GP10bhp_04u:477: BhP_04.06.039/1 taṃ brahma-nirvāṇa-samādhim āśritaṃ vyupāśritaṃ giriśaṃ yoga-kakṣām
GP10bhp_04u:478: BhP_04.06.039/2 sa-loka-pālā munayo manūnām ādyaṃ manuṃ prāñjalayaḥ praṇemuḥ
GP10bhp_04u:479: BhP_04.06.040/1 sa tūpalabhyāgatam ātma-yoniṃ surāsureśair abhivanditāṅghriḥ
GP10bhp_04u:480: BhP_04.06.040/2 utthāya cakre śirasābhivandanam arhattamaḥ kasya yathaiva viṣṇuḥ
GP10bhp_04u:481: BhP_04.06.041/1 tathāpare siddha-gaṇā maharṣibhir ye vai samantād anu nīlalohitam
GP10bhp_04u:482: BhP_04.06.041/2 namaskṛtaḥ prāha śaśāṅka-śekharaṃ kṛta-praṇāmaṃ prahasann ivātmabhūḥ
GP10bhp_04u:484: BhP_04.06.042/1 āne tvām īśaṃ viśvasya jagato yoni-bījayoḥ
GP10bhp_04u:485: BhP_04.06.042/2 śakteḥ śivasya ca paraṃ yat tad brahmā nirantaram
GP10bhp_04u:486: BhP_04.06.043/1 tvam eva bhagavann etac chiva-śaktyoḥ svarūpayoḥ
GP10bhp_04u:487: BhP_04.06.043/2 viśvaṃ sṛjasi pāsy atsi krīḍann ūrṇa-paṭo yathā
GP10bhp_04u:488: BhP_04.06.044/1 tvam eva dharmārtha-dughābhipattaye dakṣeṇa sūtreṇa sasarjithādhvaram
GP10bhp_04u:489: BhP_04.06.044/2 tvayaiva loke 'vasitāś ca setavo yān brāhmaṇāḥ śraddadhate dhṛta-vratāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:490: BhP_04.06.045/1 tvaṃ karmaṇāṃ maṅgala maṅgalānāṃ kartuḥ sva-lokaṃ tanuṣe svaḥ paraṃ vā
GP10bhp_04u:491: BhP_04.06.045/2 amaṅgalānāṃ ca tamisram ulbaṇaṃ viparyayaḥ kena tad eva kasyacit
GP10bhp_04u:492: BhP_04.06.046/1 na vai satāṃ tvac-caraṇārpitātmanāṃ bhūteṣu sarveṣv abhipaśyatāṃ tava
GP10bhp_04u:493: BhP_04.06.046/2 bhūtāni cātmany apṛthag-didṛkṣatāṃ prāyeṇa roṣo 'bhibhaved yathā paśum
GP10bhp_04u:495: BhP_04.06.047/2 parān duruktair vitudanty aruntudās tān māvadhīd daiva-vadhān bhavad-vidhaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:496: BhP_04.06.048/1 yasmin yadā puṣkara-nābha-māyayā durantayā spṛṣṭa-dhiyaḥ pṛthag-dṛśaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:497: BhP_04.06.048/2 kurvanti tatra hy anukampayā kṛpāṃ na sādhavo daiva-balāt kṛte kramam
GP10bhp_04u:498: BhP_04.06.049/1 bhavāṃs tu puṃsaḥ paramasya māyayā durantayāspṛṣṭa-matiḥ samasta-dṛk
GP10bhp_04u:499: BhP_04.06.049/2 tayā hatātmasv anukarma-cetaḥsv anugrahaṃ kartum ihārhasi prabho
GP10bhp_04u:500: BhP_04.06.050/1 kurv adhvarasyoddharaṇaṃ hatasya bhoḥ tvayāsamāptasya mano prajāpateḥ
GP10bhp_04u:501: BhP_04.06.050/2 na yatra bhāgaṃ tava bhāgino daduḥ kuyājino yena makho ninīyate
GP10bhp_04u:503: BhP_04.06.051/2 bhṛgoḥ śmaśrūṇi rohantu pūṣṇo dantāś ca pūrvavat
GP10bhp_04u:506: BhP_04.06.053/1 eṣa te rudra bhāgo 'stu yad-ucchiṣṭo 'dhvarasya vai
GP10bhp_04u:507: BhP_04.06.053/2 yajñas te rudra bhāgena kalpatām adya yajña-han
GP10bhp_04u:510: BhP_04.07.001/2 abhyadhāyi mahā-bāho prahasya śrūyatām iti
GP10bhp_04u:512: BhP_04.07.002/1 nāghaṃ prajeśa bālānāṃ varṇaye nānucintaye
GP10bhp_04u:513: BhP_04.07.002/2 deva-māyābhibhūtānāṃ daṇḍas tatra dhṛto mayā
GP10bhp_04u:514: BhP_04.07.003/1 prajāpater dagdha-śīrṣṇo bhavatv aja-mukhaṃ śiraḥ
GP10bhp_04u:515: BhP_04.07.003/2 mitrasya cakṣuṣekṣeta bhāgaṃ svaṃ barhiṣo bhagaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:516: BhP_04.07.004/1 pūṣā tu yajamānasya dadbhir jakṣatu piṣṭa-bhuk
GP10bhp_04u:517: BhP_04.07.004/2 devāḥ prakṛta-sarvāṅgā ye ma uccheṣaṇaṃ daduḥ
GP10bhp_04u:518: BhP_04.07.005/1 bāhubhyām aśvinoḥ pūṣṇo hastābhyāṃ kṛta-bāhavaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:519: BhP_04.07.005/2 bhavantv adhvaryavaś cānye basta-śmaśrur bhṛgur bhavet
GP10bhp_04u:521: BhP_04.07.006/1 tadā sarvāṇi bhūtāni śrutvā mīḍhuṣṭamoditam
GP10bhp_04u:522: BhP_04.07.006/2 parituṣṭātmabhis tāta sādhu sādhv ity athābruvan
GP10bhp_04u:523: BhP_04.07.007/1 tato mīḍhvāṃsam āmantrya śunāsīrāḥ saharṣibhiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:524: BhP_04.07.007/2 bhūyas tad deva-yajanaṃ sa-mīḍhvad-vedhaso yayuḥ
GP10bhp_04u:525: BhP_04.07.008/1 vidhāya kārtsnyena ca tad yad āha bhagavān bhavaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:526: BhP_04.07.008/2 sandadhuḥ kasya kāyena savanīya-paśoḥ śiraḥ
GP10bhp_04u:528: BhP_04.07.009/2 sadyaḥ supta ivottasthau dadṛśe cāgrato mṛḍam
GP10bhp_04u:532: BhP_04.07.011/2 autkaṇṭhyād bāṣpa-kalayā samparetāṃ sutāṃ smaran
GP10bhp_04u:533: BhP_04.07.012/1 kṛcchrāt saṃstabhya ca manaḥ prema-vihvalitaḥ sudhīḥ
GP10bhp_04u:536: BhP_04.07.013/1 bhūyān anugraha aho bhavatā kṛto me
GP10bhp_04u:537: BhP_04.07.013/2 daṇḍas tvayā mayi bhṛto yad api pralabdhaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:538: BhP_04.07.013/3 na brahma-bandhuṣu ca vāṃ bhagavann avajñā
GP10bhp_04u:539: BhP_04.07.013/4 tubhyaṃ hareś ca kuta eva dhṛta-vrateṣu
GP10bhp_04u:541: BhP_04.07.014/2 brahmātma-tattvam avituṃ prathamaṃ tvam asrāk
GP10bhp_04u:542: BhP_04.07.014/3 tad brāhmaṇān parama sarva-vipatsu pāsi
GP10bhp_04u:543: BhP_04.07.014/4 pālaḥ paśūn iva vibho pragṛhīta-daṇḍaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:545: BhP_04.07.015/2 kṣipto durukti-viśikhair vigaṇayya tan mām
GP10bhp_04u:547: BhP_04.07.015/4 dṛṣṭyārdrayā sa bhagavān sva-kṛtena tuṣyet
GP10bhp_04u:549: BhP_04.07.016/1 kṣamāpyaivaṃ sa mīḍhvāṃsaṃ brahmaṇā cānumantritaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:554: BhP_04.07.018/2 dhiyā viśuddhayā dadhyau tathā prādurabhūd dhariḥ
GP10bhp_04u:555: BhP_04.07.019/1 tadā sva-prabhayā teṣāṃ dyotayantyā diśo daśa
GP10bhp_04u:556: BhP_04.07.019/2 muṣṇaṃs teja upānītas tārkṣyeṇa stotra-vājinā
GP10bhp_04u:565: BhP_04.07.022/1 tam upāgatam ālakṣya sarve sura-gaṇādayaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:569: BhP_04.07.024/1 apy arvāg-vṛttayo yasya mahi tv ātmabhuv-ādayaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:577: BhP_04.07.026/2 cin-mātram ekam abhayaṃ pratiṣidhya māyām
GP10bhp_04u:578: BhP_04.07.026/3 tiṣṭhaṃs tayaiva puruṣatvam upetya tasyām
GP10bhp_04u:581: BhP_04.07.027/1 tattvaṃ na te vayam anañjana rudra-śāpāt
GP10bhp_04u:584: BhP_04.07.027/4 jñātaṃ yad-artham adhidaivam ado vyavasthāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:589: BhP_04.07.028/4 pādaukas te śaraṇada kadā yāti kāmopasṛṣṭaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:592: BhP_04.07.029/2 hy api munibhir asaktair ādareṇārhaṇīye
GP10bhp_04u:594: BhP_04.07.029/4 japati na gaṇaye tat tvat-parānugraheṇa
GP10bhp_04u:598: BhP_04.07.030/3 nātman-śritaṃ tava vidanty adhunāpi tattvaṃ
GP10bhp_04u:601: BhP_04.07.031/1 naitat svarūpaṃ bhavato 'sau padārtha- bheda-grahaiḥ puruṣo yāvad īkṣet
GP10bhp_04u:602: BhP_04.07.031/2 jñānasya cārthasya guṇasya cāśrayo māyāmayād vyatirikto matas tvam
GP10bhp_04u:604: BhP_04.07.032/1 idam apy acyuta viśva-bhāvanaṃ vapur ānanda-karaṃ mano-dṛśām
GP10bhp_04u:605: BhP_04.07.032/2 sura-vidviṭ-kṣapaṇair udāyudhair bhuja-daṇḍair upapannam aṣṭabhiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:607: BhP_04.07.033/1 yajño 'yaṃ tava yajanāya kena sṛṣṭo vidhvastaḥ paśupatinādya dakṣa-kopāt
GP10bhp_04u:608: BhP_04.07.033/2 taṃ nas tvaṃ śava-śayanābha-śānta-medhaṃ yajñātman nalina-rucā dṛśā punīhi
GP10bhp_04u:610: BhP_04.07.034/1 ananvitaṃ te bhagavan viceṣṭitaṃ yad ātmanā carasi hi karma nājyase
GP10bhp_04u:611: BhP_04.07.034/2 vibhūtaye yata upasedur īśvarīṃ na manyate svayam anuvartatīṃ bhavān
GP10bhp_04u:614: BhP_04.07.035/2 tṛṣārto 'vagāḍho na sasmāra dāvaṃ na niṣkrāmati brahma-sampannavan naḥ
GP10bhp_04u:616: BhP_04.07.036/1 svāgataṃ te prasīdeśa tubhyaṃ namaḥ śrīnivāsa śriyā kāntayā trāhi naḥ
GP10bhp_04u:617: BhP_04.07.036/2 tvām ṛte 'dhīśa nāṅgair makhaḥ śobhate śīrṣa-hīnaḥ ka-bandho yathā puruṣaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:619: BhP_04.07.037/1 dṛṣṭaḥ kiṃ no dṛgbhir asad-grahais tvaṃ pratyag-draṣṭā dṛśyate yena viśvam
GP10bhp_04u:620: BhP_04.07.037/2 māyā hy eṣā bhavadīyā hi bhūman yas tvaṃ ṣaṣṭhaḥ pañcabhir bhāsi bhūtaiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:622: BhP_04.07.038/1 preyān na te 'nyo 'sty amutas tvayi prabho viśvātmanīkṣen na pṛthag ya ātmanaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:623: BhP_04.07.038/2 athāpi bhaktyeśa tayopadhāvatām ananya-vṛttyānugṛhāṇa vatsala
GP10bhp_04u:627: BhP_04.07.040/1 namas te śrita-sattvāya dharmādīnāṃ ca sūtaye
GP10bhp_04u:628: BhP_04.07.040/2 nirguṇāya ca yat-kāṣṭhāṃ nāhaṃ vedāpare 'pi ca
GP10bhp_04u:630: BhP_04.07.041/1 yat-tejasāhaṃ susamiddha-tejā havyaṃ vahe svadhvara ājya-siktam
GP10bhp_04u:631: BhP_04.07.041/2 taṃ yajñiyaṃ pañca-vidhaṃ ca pañcabhiḥ sviṣṭaṃ yajurbhiḥ praṇato 'smi yajñam
GP10bhp_04u:633: BhP_04.07.042/1 purā kalpāpāye sva-kṛtam udarī-kṛtya vikṛtaṃ
GP10bhp_04u:634: BhP_04.07.042/2 tvam evādyas tasmin salila uragendrādhiśayane
GP10bhp_04u:635: BhP_04.07.042/3 pumān śeṣe siddhair hṛdi vimṛśitādhyātma-padaviḥ
GP10bhp_04u:636: BhP_04.07.042/4 sa evādyākṣṇor yaḥ pathi carasi bhṛtyān avasi naḥ
GP10bhp_04u:638: BhP_04.07.043/1 aṃśāṃśās te deva marīcy-ādaya ete brahmendrādyā deva-gaṇā rudra-purogāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:639: BhP_04.07.043/2 krīḍā-bhāṇḍaṃ viśvam idaṃ yasya vibhūman tasmai nityaṃ nātha namas te karavāma
GP10bhp_04u:642: BhP_04.07.044/2 kṛtvā mamāham iti durmatir utpathaiḥ svaiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:646: BhP_04.07.045/1 tvaṃ kratus tvaṃ havis tvaṃ hutāśaḥ svayaṃ tvaṃ hi mantraḥ samid-darbha-pātrāṇi ca
GP10bhp_04u:647: BhP_04.07.045/2 tvaṃ sadasyartvijo dampatī devatā agnihotraṃ svadhā soma ājyaṃ paśuḥ
GP10bhp_04u:648: BhP_04.07.046/1 tvaṃ purā gāṃ rasāyā mahā-sūkaro daṃṣṭrayā padminīṃ vāraṇendro yathā
GP10bhp_04u:649: BhP_04.07.046/2 stūyamāno nadal līlayā yogibhir vyujjahartha trayī-gātra yajña-kratuḥ
GP10bhp_04u:650: BhP_04.07.047/1 sa prasīda tvam asmākam ākāṅkṣatāṃ darśanaṃ te paribhraṣṭa-sat-karmaṇām
GP10bhp_04u:651: BhP_04.07.047/2 kīrtyamāne nṛbhir nāmni yajñeśa te yajña-vighnāḥ kṣayaṃ yānti tasmai namaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:653: BhP_04.07.048/1 iti dakṣaḥ kavir yajñaṃ bhadra rudrābhimarśitam
GP10bhp_04u:655: BhP_04.07.049/1 bhagavān svena bhāgena sarvātmā sarva-bhāga-bhuk
GP10bhp_04u:656: BhP_04.07.049/2 dakṣaṃ babhāṣa ābhāṣya prīyamāṇa ivānagha
GP10bhp_04u:658: BhP_04.07.050/1 ahaṃ brahmā ca śarvaś ca jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ param
GP10bhp_04u:660: BhP_04.07.051/1 ātma-māyāṃ samāviśya so 'haṃ guṇamayīṃ dvija
GP10bhp_04u:661: BhP_04.07.051/2 sṛjan rakṣan haran viśvaṃ dadhre saṃjñāṃ kriyocitām
GP10bhp_04u:662: BhP_04.07.052/1 tasmin brahmaṇy advitīye kevale paramātmani
GP10bhp_04u:664: BhP_04.07.053/1 yathā pumān na svāṅgeṣu śiraḥ-pāṇy-ādiṣu kvacit
GP10bhp_04u:665: BhP_04.07.053/2 pārakya-buddhiṃ kurute evaṃ bhūteṣu mat-paraḥ
GP10bhp_04u:666: BhP_04.07.054/1 trayāṇām eka-bhāvānāṃ yo na paśyati vai bhidām
GP10bhp_04u:667: BhP_04.07.054/2 sarva-bhūtātmanāṃ brahman sa śāntim adhigacchati
GP10bhp_04u:670: BhP_04.07.055/2 arcitvā kratunā svena devān ubhayato 'yajat
GP10bhp_04u:671: BhP_04.07.056/1 rudraṃ ca svena bhāgena hy upādhāvat samāhitaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:673: BhP_04.07.056/3 udavasya sahartvigbhiḥ sasnāv avabhṛthaṃ tataḥ
GP10bhp_04u:675: BhP_04.07.057/2 dharma eva matiṃ dattvā tridaśās te divaṃ yayuḥ
GP10bhp_04u:676: BhP_04.07.058/1 evaṃ dākṣāyaṇī hitvā satī pūrva-kalevaram
GP10bhp_04u:677: BhP_04.07.058/2 jajñe himavataḥ kṣetre menāyām iti śuśruma
GP10bhp_04u:678: BhP_04.07.059/1 tam eva dayitaṃ bhūya āvṛṅkte patim ambikā
GP10bhp_04u:680: BhP_04.07.060/1 etad bhagavataḥ śambhoḥ karma dakṣādhvara-druhaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:681: BhP_04.07.060/2 śrutaṃ bhāgavatāc chiṣyād uddhavān me bṛhaspateḥ
GP10bhp_04u:682: BhP_04.07.061/1 idaṃ pavitraṃ param īśa-ceṣṭitaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyam aghaugha-marṣaṇam
GP10bhp_04u:683: BhP_04.07.061/2 yo nityadākarṇya naro 'nukīrtayed dhunoty aghaṃ kaurava bhakti-bhāvataḥ
GP10bhp_04u:685: BhP_04.08.001/1 sanakādyā nāradaś ca ṛbhur haṃso 'ruṇir yatiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:686: BhP_04.08.001/2 naite gṛhān brahma-sutā hy āvasann ūrdhva-retasaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:687: BhP_04.08.002/1 mṛṣādharmasya bhāryāsīd dambhaṃ māyāṃ ca śatru-han
GP10bhp_04u:688: BhP_04.08.002/2 asūta mithunaṃ tat tu nirṛtir jagṛhe 'prajaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:689: BhP_04.08.003/1 tayoḥ samabhaval lobho nikṛtiś ca mahā-mate
GP10bhp_04u:690: BhP_04.08.003/2 tābhyāṃ krodhaś ca hiṃsā ca yad duruktiḥ svasā kaliḥ
GP10bhp_04u:691: BhP_04.08.004/1 duruktau kalir ādhatta bhayaṃ mṛtyuṃ ca sattama
GP10bhp_04u:692: BhP_04.08.004/2 tayoś ca mithunaṃ jajñe yātanā nirayas tathā
GP10bhp_04u:694: BhP_04.08.005/2 triḥ śrutvaitat pumān puṇyaṃ vidhunoty ātmano malam
GP10bhp_04u:695: BhP_04.08.006/1 athātaḥ kīrtaye vaṃśaṃ puṇya-kīrteḥ kurūdvaha
GP10bhp_04u:698: BhP_04.08.007/2 vāsudevasya kalayā rakṣāyāṃ jagataḥ sthitau
GP10bhp_04u:699: BhP_04.08.008/1 jāye uttānapādasya sunītiḥ surucis tayoḥ
GP10bhp_04u:700: BhP_04.08.008/2 suruciḥ preyasī patyur netarā yat-suto dhruvaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:701: BhP_04.08.009/1 ekadā suruceḥ putram aṅkam āropya lālayan
GP10bhp_04u:703: BhP_04.08.010/1 tathā cikīrṣamāṇaṃ taṃ sapatnyās tanayaṃ dhruvam
GP10bhp_04u:704: BhP_04.08.010/2 suruciḥ śṛṇvato rājñaḥ serṣyam āhātigarvitā
GP10bhp_04u:705: BhP_04.08.011/1 na vatsa nṛpater dhiṣṇyaṃ bhavān āroḍhum arhati
GP10bhp_04u:706: BhP_04.08.011/2 na gṛhīto mayā yat tvaṃ kukṣāv api nṛpātmajaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:708: BhP_04.08.012/2 nūnaṃ veda bhavān yasya durlabhe 'rthe manorathaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:710: BhP_04.08.013/2 garbhe tvaṃ sādhayātmānaṃ yadīcchasi nṛpāsanam
GP10bhp_04u:712: BhP_04.08.014/1 mātuḥ sapatnyāḥ sa durukti-viddhaḥ śvasan ruṣā daṇḍa-hato yathāhiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:713: BhP_04.08.014/2 hitvā miṣantaṃ pitaraṃ sanna-vācaṃ jagāma mātuḥ prarudan sakāśam
GP10bhp_04u:714: BhP_04.08.015/1 taṃ niḥśvasantaṃ sphuritādharoṣṭhaṃ sunītir utsaṅga udūhya bālam
GP10bhp_04u:715: BhP_04.08.015/2 niśamya tat-paura-mukhān nitāntaṃ sā vivyathe yad gaditaṃ sapatnyā
GP10bhp_04u:716: BhP_04.08.016/1 sotsṛjya dhairyaṃ vilalāpa śoka- dāvāgninā dāva-lateva bālā
GP10bhp_04u:717: BhP_04.08.016/2 vākyaṃ sapatnyāḥ smaratī saroja- śriyā dṛśā bāṣpa-kalām uvāha
GP10bhp_04u:718: BhP_04.08.017/1 dīrghaṃ śvasantī vṛjinasya pāram apaśyatī bālakam āha bālā
GP10bhp_04u:719: BhP_04.08.017/2 māmaṅgalaṃ tāta pareṣu maṃsthā bhuṅkte jano yat para-duḥkhadas tat
GP10bhp_04u:720: BhP_04.08.018/1 satyaṃ surucyābhihitaṃ bhavān me yad durbhagāyā udare gṛhītaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:721: BhP_04.08.018/2 stanyena vṛddhaś ca vilajjate yāṃ bhāryeti vā voḍhum iḍaspatir mām
GP10bhp_04u:722: BhP_04.08.019/1 ātiṣṭha tat tāta vimatsaras tvam uktaṃ samātrāpi yad avyalīkam
GP10bhp_04u:725: BhP_04.08.020/2 ajo 'dhyatiṣṭhat khalu pārameṣṭhyaṃ padaṃ jitātma-śvasanābhivandyam
GP10bhp_04u:726: BhP_04.08.021/1 tathā manur vo bhagavān pitāmaho yam eka-matyā puru-dakṣiṇair makhaiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:727: BhP_04.08.021/2 iṣṭvābhipede duravāpam anyato bhaumaṃ sukhaṃ divyam athāpavargyam
GP10bhp_04u:728: BhP_04.08.022/1 tam eva vatsāśraya bhṛtya-vatsalaṃ mumukṣubhir mṛgya-padābja-paddhatim
GP10bhp_04u:729: BhP_04.08.022/2 ananya-bhāve nija-dharma-bhāvite manasy avasthāpya bhajasva pūruṣam
GP10bhp_04u:730: BhP_04.08.023/1 nānyaṃ tataḥ padma-palāśa-locanād duḥkha-cchidaṃ te mṛgayāmi kañcana
GP10bhp_04u:731: BhP_04.08.023/2 yo mṛgyate hasta-gṛhīta-padmayā śriyetarair aṅga vimṛgyamāṇayā
GP10bhp_04u:733: BhP_04.08.024/1 evaṃ sañjalpitaṃ mātur ākarṇyārthāgamaṃ vacaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:735: BhP_04.08.025/1 nāradas tad upākarṇya jñātvā tasya cikīrṣitam
GP10bhp_04u:736: BhP_04.08.025/2 spṛṣṭvā mūrdhany agha-ghnena pāṇinā prāha vismitaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:737: BhP_04.08.026/1 aho tejaḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ māna-bhaṅgam amṛṣyatām
GP10bhp_04u:738: BhP_04.08.026/2 bālo 'py ayaṃ hṛdā dhatte yat samātur asad-vacaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:740: BhP_04.08.027/1 nādhunāpy avamānaṃ te sammānaṃ vāpi putraka
GP10bhp_04u:742: BhP_04.08.028/1 vikalpe vidyamāne 'pi na hy asantoṣa-hetavaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:743: BhP_04.08.028/2 puṃso moham ṛte bhinnā yal loke nija-karmabhiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:744: BhP_04.08.029/1 parituṣyet tatas tāta tāvan-mātreṇa pūruṣaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:747: BhP_04.08.030/2 yat-prasādaṃ sa vai puṃsāṃ durārādhyo mato mama
GP10bhp_04u:750: BhP_04.08.032/1 ato nivartatām eṣa nirbandhas tava niṣphalaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:751: BhP_04.08.032/2 yatiṣyati bhavān kāle śreyasāṃ samupasthite
GP10bhp_04u:752: BhP_04.08.033/1 yasya yad daiva-vihitaṃ sa tena sukha-duḥkhayoḥ
GP10bhp_04u:753: BhP_04.08.033/2 ātmānaṃ toṣayan dehī tamasaḥ pāram ṛcchati
GP10bhp_04u:754: BhP_04.08.034/1 guṇādhikān mudaṃ lipsed anukrośaṃ guṇādhamāt
GP10bhp_04u:755: BhP_04.08.034/2 maitrīṃ samānād anvicchen na tāpair abhibhūyate
GP10bhp_04u:758: BhP_04.08.035/2 darśitaḥ kṛpayā puṃsāṃ durdarśo 'smad-vidhais tu yaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:759: BhP_04.08.036/1 athāpi me 'vinītasya kṣāttraṃ ghoram upeyuṣaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:760: BhP_04.08.036/2 surucyā durvaco-bāṇair na bhinne śrayate hṛdi
GP10bhp_04u:761: BhP_04.08.037/1 padaṃ tri-bhuvanotkṛṣṭaṃ jigīṣoḥ sādhu vartma me
GP10bhp_04u:762: BhP_04.08.037/2 brūhy asmat-pitṛbhir brahmann anyair apy anadhiṣṭhitam
GP10bhp_04u:763: BhP_04.08.038/1 nūnaṃ bhavān bhagavato yo 'ṅgajaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:764: BhP_04.08.038/2 vitudann aṭate vīṇāṃ hitāya jagato 'rkavat
GP10bhp_04u:766: BhP_04.08.039/1 ity udāhṛtam ākarṇya bhagavān nāradas tadā
GP10bhp_04u:767: BhP_04.08.039/2 prītaḥ pratyāha taṃ bālaṃ sad-vākyam anukampayā
GP10bhp_04u:769: BhP_04.08.040/1 jananyābhihitaḥ panthāḥ sa vai niḥśreyasasya te
GP10bhp_04u:770: BhP_04.08.040/2 bhagavān vāsudevas taṃ bhaja taṃ pravaṇātmanā
GP10bhp_04u:771: BhP_04.08.041/1 dharmārtha-kāma-mokṣākhyaṃ ya icchec chreya ātmanaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:772: BhP_04.08.041/2 ekaṃ hy eva hares tatra kāraṇaṃ pāda-sevanam
GP10bhp_04u:773: BhP_04.08.042/1 tat tāta gaccha bhadraṃ te yamunāyās taṭaṃ śuci
GP10bhp_04u:774: BhP_04.08.042/2 puṇyaṃ madhuvanaṃ yatra sānnidhyaṃ nityadā hareḥ
GP10bhp_04u:775: BhP_04.08.043/1 snātvānusavanaṃ tasmin kālindyāḥ salile śive
GP10bhp_04u:778: BhP_04.08.044/2 śanair vyudasyābhidhyāyen manasā guruṇā gurum
GP10bhp_04u:780: BhP_04.08.045/2 sunāsaṃ subhruvaṃ cāru- kapolaṃ sura-sundaram
GP10bhp_04u:793: BhP_04.08.052/1 evaṃ bhagavato rūpaṃ subhadraṃ dhyāyato manaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:794: BhP_04.08.052/2 nirvṛtyā parayā tūrṇaṃ sampannaṃ na nivartate
GP10bhp_04u:795: BhP_04.08.053/1 japaś ca paramo guhyaḥ śrūyatāṃ me nṛpātmaja
GP10bhp_04u:796: BhP_04.08.053/2 yaṃ sapta-rātraṃ prapaṭhan pumān paśyati khecarān
GP10bhp_04u:798: BhP_04.08.054/1 mantreṇānena devasya kuryād dravyamayīṃ budhaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:800: BhP_04.08.055/1 salilaiḥ śucibhir mālyair vanyair mūla-phalādibhiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:801: BhP_04.08.055/2 śastāṅkurāṃśukaiś cārcet tulasyā priyayā prabhum
GP10bhp_04u:802: BhP_04.08.056/1 labdhvā dravyamayīm arcāṃ kṣity-ambv-ādiṣu vārcayet
GP10bhp_04u:803: BhP_04.08.056/2 ābhṛtātmā muniḥ śānto yata-vāṅ mita-vanya-bhuk
GP10bhp_04u:805: BhP_04.08.057/2 kariṣyaty uttamaślokas tad dhyāyed dhṛdayaṅ-gamam
GP10bhp_04u:808: BhP_04.08.059/1 evaṃ kāyena manasā vacasā ca mano-gatam
GP10bhp_04u:810: BhP_04.08.060/1 puṃsām amāyināṃ samyag bhajatāṃ bhāva-vardhanaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:811: BhP_04.08.060/2 śreyo diśaty abhimataṃ yad dharmādiṣu dehinām
GP10bhp_04u:814: BhP_04.08.062/1 ity uktas taṃ parikramya praṇamya ca nṛpārbhakaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:815: BhP_04.08.062/2 yayau madhuvanaṃ puṇyaṃ hareś caraṇa-carcitam
GP10bhp_04u:816: BhP_04.08.063/1 tapo-vanaṃ gate tasmin praviṣṭo 'ntaḥ-puraṃ muniḥ
GP10bhp_04u:817: BhP_04.08.063/2 arhitārhaṇako rājñā sukhāsīna uvāca tam
GP10bhp_04u:819: BhP_04.08.064/1 rājan kiṃ dhyāyase dīrghaṃ mukhena pariśuṣyatā
GP10bhp_04u:820: BhP_04.08.064/2 kiṃ vā na riṣyate kāmo dharmo vārthena saṃyutaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:822: BhP_04.08.065/1 suto me bālako brahman straiṇenākaruṇātmanā
GP10bhp_04u:823: BhP_04.08.065/2 nirvāsitaḥ pañca-varṣaḥ saha mātrā mahān kaviḥ
GP10bhp_04u:824: BhP_04.08.066/1 apy anāthaṃ vane brahman mā smādanty arbhakaṃ vṛkāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:826: BhP_04.08.067/1 aho me bata daurātmyaṃ strī-jitasyopadhāraya
GP10bhp_04u:829: BhP_04.08.068/1 mā mā śucaḥ sva-tanayaṃ deva-guptaṃ viśāmpate
GP10bhp_04u:830: BhP_04.08.068/2 tat-prabhāvam avijñāya prāvṛṅkte yad-yaśo jagat
GP10bhp_04u:831: BhP_04.08.069/1 suduṣkaraṃ karma kṛtvā loka-pālair api prabhuḥ
GP10bhp_04u:832: BhP_04.08.069/2 aiṣyaty acirato rājan yaśo vipulayaṃs tava
GP10bhp_04u:834: BhP_04.08.070/1 iti devarṣiṇā proktaṃ viśrutya jagatī-patiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:836: BhP_04.08.071/1 tatrābhiṣiktaḥ prayatas tām upoṣya vibhāvarīm
GP10bhp_04u:840: BhP_04.08.073/1 dvitīyaṃ ca tathā māsaṃ ṣaṣṭhe ṣaṣṭhe 'rbhako dine
GP10bhp_04u:842: BhP_04.08.074/1 tṛtīyaṃ cānayan māsaṃ navame navame 'hani
GP10bhp_04u:844: BhP_04.08.075/1 caturtham api vai māsaṃ dvādaśe dvādaśe 'hani
GP10bhp_04u:845: BhP_04.08.075/2 vāyu-bhakṣo jita-śvāso dhyāyan devam adhārayat
GP10bhp_04u:846: BhP_04.08.076/1 pañcame māsy anuprāpte jita-śvāso nṛpātmajaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:847: BhP_04.08.076/2 dhyāyan brahma padaikena tasthau sthāṇur ivācalaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:848: BhP_04.08.077/1 sarvato mana ākṛṣya hṛdi bhūtendriyāśayam
GP10bhp_04u:849: BhP_04.08.077/2 dhyāyan bhagavato rūpaṃ nādrākṣīt kiñcanāparam
GP10bhp_04u:851: BhP_04.08.078/2 brahma dhārayamāṇasya trayo lokāś cakampire
GP10bhp_04u:852: BhP_04.08.079/1 yadaika-pādena sa pārthivārbhakas tasthau tad-aṅguṣṭha-nipīḍitā mahī
GP10bhp_04u:853: BhP_04.08.079/2 nanāma tatrārdham ibhendra-dhiṣṭhitā tarīva savyetarataḥ pade pade
GP10bhp_04u:854: BhP_04.08.080/1 tasminn abhidhyāyati viśvam ātmano dvāraṃ nirudhyāsum ananyayā dhiyā
GP10bhp_04u:855: BhP_04.08.080/2 lokā nirucchvāsa-nipīḍitā bhṛśaṃ sa-loka-pālāḥ śaraṇaṃ yayur harim
GP10bhp_04u:857: BhP_04.08.081/1 naivaṃ vidāmo bhagavan prāṇa-rodhaṃ carācarasyākhila-sattva-dhāmnaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:858: BhP_04.08.081/2 vidhehi tan no vṛjinād vimokṣaṃ prāptā vayaṃ tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ śaraṇyam
GP10bhp_04u:860: BhP_04.08.082/1 mā bhaiṣṭa bālaṃ tapaso duratyayān nivartayiṣye pratiyāta sva-dhāma
GP10bhp_04u:861: BhP_04.08.082/2 yato hi vaḥ prāṇa-nirodha āsīd auttānapādir mayi saṅgatātmā
GP10bhp_04u:863: BhP_04.09.001/1 ta evam utsanna-bhayā urukrame kṛtāvanāmāḥ prayayus tri-viṣṭapam
GP10bhp_04u:864: BhP_04.09.001/2 sahasraśīrṣāpi tato garutmatā madhor vanaṃ bhṛtya-didṛkṣayā gataḥ
GP10bhp_04u:865: BhP_04.09.002/1 sa vai dhiyā yoga-vipāka-tīvrayā hṛt-padma-kośe sphuritaṃ taḍit-prabham
GP10bhp_04u:866: BhP_04.09.002/2 tirohitaṃ sahasaivopalakṣya bahiḥ-sthitaṃ tad-avasthaṃ dadarśa
GP10bhp_04u:867: BhP_04.09.003/1 tad-darśanenāgata-sādhvasaḥ kṣitāv avandatāṅgaṃ vinamayya daṇḍavat
GP10bhp_04u:868: BhP_04.09.003/2 dṛgbhyāṃ prapaśyan prapibann ivārbhakaś cumbann ivāsyena bhujair ivāśliṣan
GP10bhp_04u:869: BhP_04.09.004/1 sa taṃ vivakṣantam atad-vidaṃ harir jñātvāsya sarvasya ca hṛdy avasthitaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:870: BhP_04.09.004/2 kṛtāñjaliṃ brahmamayena kambunā pasparśa bālaṃ kṛpayā kapole
GP10bhp_04u:871: BhP_04.09.005/1 sa vai tadaiva pratipāditāṃ giraṃ daivīṃ parijñāta-parātma-nirṇayaḥ

GP10bhp_04u:1364: BhP_04.13.034/2 ārādhito yathaivaiṣa tathā puṃsāṃ phalodayaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1365: BhP_04.13.035/1 iti vyavasitā viprās tasya rājñaḥ prajātaye
GP10bhp_04u:1367: BhP_04.13.036/1 tasmāt puruṣa uttasthau hema-māly amalāmbaraḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1368: BhP_04.13.036/2 hiraṇmayena pātreṇa siddham ādāya pāyasam
GP10bhp_04u:1370: BhP_04.13.037/2 avaghrāya mudā yuktaḥ prādāt patnyā udāra-dhīḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1371: BhP_04.13.038/1 sā tat puṃ-savanaṃ rājñī prāśya vai patyur ādadhe
GP10bhp_04u:1372: BhP_04.13.038/2 garbhaṃ kāla upāvṛtte kumāraṃ suṣuve 'prajā
GP10bhp_04u:1373: BhP_04.13.039/1 sa bāla eva puruṣo mātāmaham anuvrataḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1375: BhP_04.13.040/1 sa śarāsanam udyamya mṛgayur vana-gocaraḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1376: BhP_04.13.040/2 hanty asādhur mṛgān dīnān veno 'sāv ity arauj janaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1377: BhP_04.13.041/1 ākrīḍe krīḍato bālān vayasyān atidāruṇaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1379: BhP_04.13.042/1 taṃ vicakṣya khalaṃ putraṃ śāsanair vividhair nṛpaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1380: BhP_04.13.042/2 yadā na śāsituṃ kalpo bhṛśam āsīt sudurmanāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1382: BhP_04.13.043/2 kad-apatya-bhṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ ye na vindanti durbharam
GP10bhp_04u:1383: BhP_04.13.044/1 yataḥ pāpīyasī kīrtir adharmaś ca mahān nṛṇām
GP10bhp_04u:1384: BhP_04.13.044/2 yato virodhaḥ sarveṣāṃ yata ādhir anantakaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1385: BhP_04.13.045/1 kas taṃ prajāpadeśaṃ vai moha-bandhanam ātmanaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1386: BhP_04.13.045/2 paṇḍito bahu manyeta yad-arthāḥ kleśadā gṛhāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1387: BhP_04.13.046/1 kad-apatyaṃ varaṃ manye sad-apatyāc chucāṃ padāt
GP10bhp_04u:1388: BhP_04.13.046/2 nirvidyeta gṛhān martyo yat-kleśa-nivahā gṛhāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1389: BhP_04.13.047/1 evaṃ sa nirviṇṇa-manā nṛpo gṛhān niśītha utthāya mahodayodayāt
GP10bhp_04u:1390: BhP_04.13.047/2 alabdha-nidro 'nupalakṣito nṛbhir hitvā gato vena-suvaṃ prasuptām
GP10bhp_04u:1391: BhP_04.13.048/1 vijñāya nirvidya gataṃ patiṃ prajāḥ purohitāmātya-suhṛd-gaṇādayaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1392: BhP_04.13.048/2 vicikyur urvyām atiśoka-kātarā yathā nigūḍhaṃ puruṣaṃ kuyoginaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1393: BhP_04.13.049/1 alakṣayantaḥ padavīṃ prajāpater hatodyamāḥ pratyupasṛtya te purīm
GP10bhp_04u:1394: BhP_04.13.049/2 ṛṣīn sametān abhivandya sāśravo nyavedayan paurava bhartṛ-viplavam
GP10bhp_04u:1396: BhP_04.14.001/1 bhṛgv-ādayas te munayo lokānāṃ kṣema-darśinaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1397: BhP_04.14.001/2 goptary asati vai nṝṇāṃ paśyantaḥ paśu-sāmyatām
GP10bhp_04u:1399: BhP_04.14.002/2 prakṛty-asammataṃ venam abhyaṣiñcan patiṃ bhuvaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1401: BhP_04.14.003/2 nililyur dasyavaḥ sadyaḥ sarpa-trastā ivākhavaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1403: BhP_04.14.004/2 avamene mahā-bhāgān stabdhaḥ sambhāvitaḥ svataḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1404: BhP_04.14.005/1 evaṃ madāndha utsikto niraṅkuśa iva dvipaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1405: BhP_04.14.005/2 paryaṭan ratham āsthāya kampayann iva rodasī
GP10bhp_04u:1406: BhP_04.14.006/1 na yaṣṭavyaṃ na dātavyaṃ na hotavyaṃ dvijāḥ kvacit
GP10bhp_04u:1407: BhP_04.14.006/2 iti nyavārayad dharmaṃ bherī-ghoṣeṇa sarvaśaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1409: BhP_04.14.007/2 vimṛśya loka-vyasanaṃ kṛpayocuḥ sma satriṇaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1410: BhP_04.14.008/1 aho ubhayataḥ prāptaṃ lokasya vyasanaṃ mahat
GP10bhp_04u:1411: BhP_04.14.008/2 dāruṇy ubhayato dīpte iva taskara-pālayoḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1413: BhP_04.14.009/2 tato 'py āsīd bhayaṃ tv adya kathaṃ syāt svasti dehinām
GP10bhp_04u:1414: BhP_04.14.010/1 aher iva payaḥ-poṣaḥ poṣakasyāpy anartha-bhṛt
GP10bhp_04u:1416: BhP_04.14.011/1 nirūpitaḥ prajā-pālaḥ sa jighāṃsati vai prajāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1417: BhP_04.14.011/2 tathāpi sāntvayemāmuṃ nāsmāṃs tat-pātakaṃ spṛśet
GP10bhp_04u:1418: BhP_04.14.012/1 tad-vidvadbhir asad-vṛtto veno 'smābhiḥ kṛto nṛpaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1419: BhP_04.14.012/2 sāntvito yadi no vācaṃ na grahīṣyaty adharma-kṛt
GP10bhp_04u:1422: BhP_04.14.013/3 upavrajyābruvan venaṃ sāntvayitvā ca sāmabhiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1424: BhP_04.14.014/1 nṛpa-varya nibodhaitad yat te vijñāpayāma bhoḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1427: BhP_04.14.015/2 lokān viśokān vitaraty athānantyam asaṅginām
GP10bhp_04u:1428: BhP_04.14.016/1 sa te mā vinaśed vīra prajānāṃ kṣema-lakṣaṇaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1429: BhP_04.14.016/2 yasmin vinaṣṭe nṛpatir aiśvaryād avarohati
GP10bhp_04u:1430: BhP_04.14.017/1 rājann asādhv-amātyebhyaś corādibhyaḥ prajā nṛpaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1431: BhP_04.14.017/2 rakṣan yathā baliṃ gṛhṇann iha pretya ca modate
GP10bhp_04u:1432: BhP_04.14.018/1 yasya rāṣṭre pure caiva bhagavān yajña-pūruṣaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1433: BhP_04.14.018/2 ijyate svena dharmeṇa janair varṇāśramānvitaiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1434: BhP_04.14.019/1 tasya rājño mahā-bhāga bhagavān bhūta-bhāvanaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1436: BhP_04.14.020/1 tasmiṃs tuṣṭe kim aprāpyaṃjagatām īśvareśvare
GP10bhp_04u:1437: BhP_04.14.020/2 lokāḥ sapālā hy etasmai haranti balim ādṛtāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1438: BhP_04.14.021/1 taṃ sarva-lokāmara-yajña-saṅgrahaṃ trayīmayaṃ dravyamayaṃ tapomayam
GP10bhp_04u:1439: BhP_04.14.021/2 yajñair vicitrair yajato bhavāya te rājan sva-deśān anuroddhum arhasi
GP10bhp_04u:1440: BhP_04.14.022/1 yajñena yuṣmad-viṣaye dvijātibhir vitāyamānena surāḥ kalā hareḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1441: BhP_04.14.022/2 sviṣṭāḥ sutuṣṭāḥ pradiśanti vāñchitaṃ tad-dhelanaṃ nārhasi vīra ceṣṭitum
GP10bhp_04u:1443: BhP_04.14.023/1 bāliśā bata yūyaṃ vā adharme dharma-māninaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1444: BhP_04.14.023/2 ye vṛttidaṃ patiṃ hitvā jāraṃ patim upāsate
GP10bhp_04u:1445: BhP_04.14.024/1 avajānanty amī mūḍhā nṛpa-rūpiṇam īśvaram
GP10bhp_04u:1446: BhP_04.14.024/2 nānuvindanti te bhadram iha loke paratra ca
GP10bhp_04u:1447: BhP_04.14.025/1 ko yajña-puruṣo nāma yatra vo bhaktir īdṛśī
GP10bhp_04u:1449: BhP_04.14.026/1 viṣṇur viriñco giriśa indro vāyur yamo raviḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1450: BhP_04.14.026/2 parjanyo dhanadaḥ somaḥ kṣitir agnir apāmpatiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1451: BhP_04.14.027/1 ete cānye ca vibudhāḥ prabhavo vara-śāpayoḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1452: BhP_04.14.027/2 dehe bhavanti nṛpateḥ sarva-devamayo nṛpaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1453: BhP_04.14.028/1 tasmān māṃ karmabhir viprā yajadhvaṃ gata-matsarāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1454: BhP_04.14.028/2 baliṃ ca mahyaṃ harata matto 'nyaḥ ko 'gra-bhuk pumān
GP10bhp_04u:1456: BhP_04.14.029/1 itthaṃ viparyaya-matiḥ pāpīyān utpathaṃ gataḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1457: BhP_04.14.029/2 anunīyamānas tad-yācñāṃ na cakre bhraṣṭa-maṅgalaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1458: BhP_04.14.030/1 iti te 'sat-kṛtās tena dvijāḥ paṇḍita-māninā
GP10bhp_04u:1459: BhP_04.14.030/2 bhagnāyāṃ bhavya-yācñāyāṃ tasmai vidura cukrudhuḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1460: BhP_04.14.031/1 hanyatāṃ hanyatām eṣa pāpaḥ prakṛti-dāruṇaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1461: BhP_04.14.031/2 jīvan jagad asāv āśu kurute bhasmasād dhruvam
GP10bhp_04u:1464: BhP_04.14.033/1 ko vainaṃ paricakṣīta venam ekam ṛte 'śubham
GP10bhp_04u:1466: BhP_04.14.034/1 itthaṃ vyavasitā hantum ṛṣayo rūḍha-manyavaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1467: BhP_04.14.034/2 nijaghnur huṅkṛtair venaṃ hatam acyuta-nindayā
GP10bhp_04u:1469: BhP_04.14.035/2 sunīthā pālayām āsa vidyā-yogena śocatī
GP10bhp_04u:1470: BhP_04.14.036/1 ekadā munayas te tu sarasvat-salilāplutāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1471: BhP_04.14.036/2 hutvāgnīn sat-kathāś cakrur upaviṣṭāḥ sarit-taṭe
GP10bhp_04u:1473: BhP_04.14.037/2 apy abhadram anāthāyā dasyubhyo na bhaved bhuvaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1474: BhP_04.14.038/1 evaṃ mṛśanta ṛṣayo dhāvatāṃ sarvato-diśam
GP10bhp_04u:1475: BhP_04.14.038/2 pāṃsuḥ samutthito bhūriś corāṇām abhilumpatām
GP10bhp_04u:1476: BhP_04.14.039/1 tad upadravam ājñāya lokasya vasu lumpatām
GP10bhp_04u:1477: BhP_04.14.039/2 bhartary uparate tasminn anyonyaṃ ca jighāṃsatām
GP10bhp_04u:1479: BhP_04.14.040/2 lokān nāvārayañ chaktā api tad-doṣa-darśinaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1480: BhP_04.14.041/1 brāhmaṇaḥ sama-dṛk śānto dīnānāṃ samupekṣakaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1481: BhP_04.14.041/2 sravate brahma tasyāpi bhinna-bhāṇḍāt payo yathā
GP10bhp_04u:1482: BhP_04.14.042/1 nāṅgasya vaṃśo rājarṣer eṣa saṃsthātum arhati
GP10bhp_04u:1483: BhP_04.14.042/2 amogha-vīryā hi nṛpā vaṃśe 'smin keśavāśrayāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1485: BhP_04.14.043/2 mamanthur ūruṃ tarasā tatrāsīd bāhuko naraḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1488: BhP_04.14.045/1 taṃ tu te 'vanataṃ dīnaṃ kiṃ karomīti vādinam
GP10bhp_04u:1489: BhP_04.14.045/2 niṣīdety abruvaṃs tāta sa niṣādas tato 'bhavat
GP10bhp_04u:1490: BhP_04.14.046/1 tasya vaṃśyās tu naiṣādā giri-kānana-gocarāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1493: BhP_04.15.001/1 atha tasya punar viprair aputrasya mahīpateḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1495: BhP_04.15.002/1 tad dṛṣṭvā mithunaṃ jātam ṛṣayo brahma-vādinaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1498: BhP_04.15.003/1 eṣa viṣṇor bhagavataḥ kalā bhuvana-pālinī
GP10bhp_04u:1499: BhP_04.15.003/2 iyaṃ ca lakṣmyāḥ sambhūtiḥ puruṣasyānapāyinī
GP10bhp_04u:1500: BhP_04.15.004/1 ayaṃ tu prathamo rājñāṃ pumān prathayitā yaśaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1501: BhP_04.15.004/2 pṛthur nāma mahārājo bhaviṣyati pṛthu-śravāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1502: BhP_04.15.005/1 iyaṃ ca sudatī devī guṇa-bhūṣaṇa-bhūṣaṇā
GP10bhp_04u:1503: BhP_04.15.005/2 arcir nāma varārohā pṛthum evāvarundhatī
GP10bhp_04u:1504: BhP_04.15.006/1 eṣa sākṣād dharer aṃśojāto loka-rirakṣayā
GP10bhp_04u:1505: BhP_04.15.006/2 iyaṃ ca tat-parā hi śrīr anujajñe 'napāyinī
GP10bhp_04u:1507: BhP_04.15.007/1 praśaṃsanti sma taṃ viprā gandharva-pravarā jaguḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1508: BhP_04.15.007/2 mumucuḥ sumano-dhārāḥ siddhā nṛtyanti svaḥ-striyaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1510: BhP_04.15.008/2 tatra sarva upājagmur devarṣi-pitṝṇāṃ gaṇāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1511: BhP_04.15.009/1 brahmā jagad-gurur devaiḥ sahāsṛtya sureśvaraiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1512: BhP_04.15.009/2 vainyasya dakṣiṇe haste dṛṣṭvā cihnaṃ gadābhṛtaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1513: BhP_04.15.010/1 pādayor aravindaṃ ca taṃ vai mene hareḥ kalām
GP10bhp_04u:1514: BhP_04.15.010/2 yasyāpratihataṃ cakram aṃśaḥ sa parameṣṭhinaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1516: BhP_04.15.011/2 ābhiṣecanikāny asmai ājahruḥ sarvato janāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1517: BhP_04.15.012/1 sarit-samudrā girayo nāgā gāvaḥ khagā mṛgāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1518: BhP_04.15.012/2 dyauḥ kṣitiḥ sarva-bhūtāni samājahrur upāyanam
GP10bhp_04u:1521: BhP_04.15.014/1 tasmai jahāra dhanado haimaṃ vīra varāsanam
GP10bhp_04u:1523: BhP_04.15.015/1 vāyuś ca vāla-vyajane dharmaḥ kīrtimayīṃ srajam
GP10bhp_04u:1524: BhP_04.15.015/2 indraḥ kirīṭam utkṛṣṭaṃ daṇḍaṃ saṃyamanaṃ yamaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1525: BhP_04.15.016/1 brahmā brahmamayaṃ varma bhāratī hāram uttamam
GP10bhp_04u:1526: BhP_04.15.016/2 hariḥ sudarśanaṃ cakraṃ tat-patny avyāhatāṃ śriyam
GP10bhp_04u:1527: BhP_04.15.017/1 daśa-candram asiṃ rudraḥ śata-candraṃ tathāmbikā
GP10bhp_04u:1528: BhP_04.15.017/2 somo 'mṛtamayān aśvāṃs tvaṣṭā rūpāśrayaṃ ratham
GP10bhp_04u:1529: BhP_04.15.018/1 agnir āja-gavaṃ cāpaṃ sūryo raśmimayān iṣūn
GP10bhp_04u:1530: BhP_04.15.018/2 bhūḥ pāduke yogamayyau dyauḥ puṣpāvalim anvaham
GP10bhp_04u:1531: BhP_04.15.019/1 nāṭyaṃ sugītaṃ vāditram antardhānaṃ ca khecarāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1532: BhP_04.15.019/2 ṛṣayaś cāśiṣaḥ satyāḥ samudraḥ śaṅkham ātmajam
GP10bhp_04u:1533: BhP_04.15.020/1 sindhavaḥ parvatā nadyo ratha-vīthīr mahātmanaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1534: BhP_04.15.020/2 sūto 'tha māgadho vandī taṃ stotum upatasthire
GP10bhp_04u:1535: BhP_04.15.021/1 stāvakāṃs tān abhipretya pṛthur vainyaḥ pratāpavān
GP10bhp_04u:1536: BhP_04.15.021/2 megha-nirhrādayā vācā prahasann idam abravīt
GP10bhp_04u:1538: BhP_04.15.022/1 bhoḥ sūta he māgadha saumya vandin loke 'dhunāspaṣṭa-guṇasya me syāt
GP10bhp_04u:1539: BhP_04.15.022/2 kim āśrayo me stava eṣa yojyatāṃ mā mayy abhūvan vitathā giro vaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1540: BhP_04.15.023/1 tasmāt parokṣe 'smad-upaśrutāny alaṃ kariṣyatha stotram apīcya-vācaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1541: BhP_04.15.023/2 saty uttamaśloka-guṇānuvāde jugupsitaṃ na stavayanti sabhyāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1542: BhP_04.15.024/1 mahad-guṇān ātmani kartum īśaḥ kaḥ stāvakaiḥ stāvayate 'sato 'pi
GP10bhp_04u:1543: BhP_04.15.024/2 te 'syābhaviṣyann iti vipralabdho janāvahāsaṃ kumatir na veda
GP10bhp_04u:1544: BhP_04.15.025/1 prabhavo hy ātmanaḥ stotraṃjugupsanty api viśrutāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1545: BhP_04.15.025/2 hrīmantaḥ paramodārāḥ pauruṣaṃ vā vigarhitam
GP10bhp_04u:1546: BhP_04.15.026/1 vayaṃ tv aviditā loke sūtādyāpi varīmabhiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1547: BhP_04.15.026/2 karmabhiḥ katham ātmānaṃ gāpayiṣyāma bālavat
GP10bhp_04u:1549: BhP_04.16.001/1 iti bruvāṇaṃ nṛpatiṃ gāyakā muni-coditāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1551: BhP_04.16.002/1 nālaṃ vayaṃ te mahimānuvarṇane yo deva-varyo 'vatatāra māyayā
GP10bhp_04u:1552: BhP_04.16.002/2 venāṅga-jātasya ca pauruṣāṇi te vācas-patīnām api babhramur dhiyaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1553: BhP_04.16.003/1 athāpy udāra-śravasaḥ pṛthor hareḥ kalāvatārasya kathāmṛtādṛtāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1554: BhP_04.16.003/2 yathopadeśaṃ munibhiḥ pracoditāḥ ślāghyāni karmāṇi vayaṃ vitanmahi
GP10bhp_04u:1555: BhP_04.16.004/1 eṣa dharma-bhṛtāṃ śreṣṭho lokaṃ dharme 'nuvartayan
GP10bhp_04u:1556: BhP_04.16.004/2 goptā ca dharma-setūnāṃ śāstā tat-paripanthinām
GP10bhp_04u:1557: BhP_04.16.005/1 eṣa vai loka-pālānāṃ bibharty ekas tanau tanūḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1558: BhP_04.16.005/2 kāle kāle yathā-bhāgaṃ lokayor ubhayor hitam
GP10bhp_04u:1559: BhP_04.16.006/1 vasu kāla upādatte kāle cāyaṃ vimuñcati
GP10bhp_04u:1560: BhP_04.16.006/2 samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu pratapan sūryavad vibhuḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1561: BhP_04.16.007/1 titikṣaty akramaṃ vainya upary ākramatām api
GP10bhp_04u:1562: BhP_04.16.007/2 bhūtānāṃ karuṇaḥ śaśvad ārtānāṃ kṣiti-vṛttimān
GP10bhp_04u:1563: BhP_04.16.008/1 deve 'varṣaty asau devo naradeva-vapur hariḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1564: BhP_04.16.008/2 kṛcchra-prāṇāḥ prajā hy eṣa rakṣiṣyaty añjasendravat
GP10bhp_04u:1568: BhP_04.16.010/2 ananta-māhātmya-guṇaika-dhāmā pṛthuḥ pracetā iva saṃvṛtātmā
GP10bhp_04u:1571: BhP_04.16.012/1 antar bahiś ca bhūtānāṃ paśyan karmāṇi cāraṇaiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1572: BhP_04.16.012/2 udāsīna ivādhyakṣo vāyur ātmeva dehinām
GP10bhp_04u:1573: BhP_04.16.013/1 nādaṇḍyaṃ daṇḍayaty eṣa sutam ātma-dviṣām api
GP10bhp_04u:1574: BhP_04.16.013/2 daṇḍayaty ātmajam api daṇḍyaṃ dharma-pathe sthitaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1576: BhP_04.16.014/2 vartate bhagavān arko yāvat tapati go-gaṇaiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1577: BhP_04.16.015/1 rañjayiṣyati yal lokam ayam ātma-viceṣṭitaiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1578: BhP_04.16.015/2 athāmum āhū rājānaṃ mano-rañjanakaiḥ prajāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1581: BhP_04.16.017/1 mātṛ-bhaktiḥ para-strīṣu patnyām ardha ivātmanaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1582: BhP_04.16.017/2 prajāsu pitṛvat snigdhaḥ kiṅkaro brahma-vādinām
GP10bhp_04u:1585: BhP_04.16.019/1 ayaṃ tu sākṣād bhagavāṃs try-adhīśaḥ kūṭa-stha ātmā kalayāvatīrṇaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1586: BhP_04.16.019/2 yasminn avidyā-racitaṃ nirarthakaṃ paśyanti nānātvam api pratītam
GP10bhp_04u:1587: BhP_04.16.020/1 ayaṃ bhuvo maṇḍalam odayādrer goptaika-vīro naradeva-nāthaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1588: BhP_04.16.020/2 āsthāya jaitraṃ ratham ātta-cāpaḥ paryasyate dakṣiṇato yathārkaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1589: BhP_04.16.021/1 asmai nṛ-pālāḥ kila tatra tatra baliṃ hariṣyanti saloka-pālāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1590: BhP_04.16.021/2 maṃsyanta eṣāṃ striya ādi-rājaṃ cakrāyudhaṃ tad-yaśa uddharantyaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1591: BhP_04.16.022/1 ayaṃ mahīṃ gāṃ duduhe 'dhirājaḥ prajāpatir vṛtti-karaḥ prajānām
GP10bhp_04u:1592: BhP_04.16.022/2 yo līlayādrīn sva-śarāsa-koṭyā bhindan samāṃ gām akarod yathendraḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1593: BhP_04.16.023/1 visphūrjayann āja-gavaṃ dhanuḥ svayaṃ yadācarat kṣmām aviṣahyam ājau
GP10bhp_04u:1594: BhP_04.16.023/2 tadā nililyur diśi diśy asanto lāṅgūlam udyamya yathā mṛgendraḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1595: BhP_04.16.024/1 eṣo 'śvamedhāñ śatam ājahāra sarasvatī prādurabhāvi yatra
GP10bhp_04u:1596: BhP_04.16.024/2 ahārṣīd yasya hayaṃ purandaraḥ śata-kratuś carame vartamāne
GP10bhp_04u:1597: BhP_04.16.025/1 eṣa sva-sadmopavane sametya sanat-kumāraṃ bhagavantam ekam
GP10bhp_04u:1598: BhP_04.16.025/2 ārādhya bhaktyālabhatāmalaṃ taj jñānaṃ yato brahma paraṃ vidanti
GP10bhp_04u:1599: BhP_04.16.026/1 tatra tatra giras tās tā iti viśruta-vikramaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1600: BhP_04.16.026/2 śroṣyaty ātmāśritā gāthāḥ pṛthuḥ pṛthu-parākramaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1602: BhP_04.16.027/2 surāsurendrair upagīyamāna- mahānubhāvo bhavitā patir bhuvaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1604: BhP_04.17.001/1 evaṃ sa bhagavān vainyaḥ khyāpito guṇa-karmabhiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1605: BhP_04.17.001/2 chandayām āsa tān kāmaiḥ pratipūjyābhinandya ca
GP10bhp_04u:1607: BhP_04.17.002/2 paurān jāna-padān śreṇīḥ prakṛtīḥ samapūjayat
GP10bhp_04u:1609: BhP_04.17.003/1 kasmād dadhāra go-rūpaṃ dharitrī bahu-rūpiṇī
GP10bhp_04u:1610: BhP_04.17.003/2 yāṃ dudoha pṛthus tatra ko vatso dohanaṃ ca kim
GP10bhp_04u:1611: BhP_04.17.004/1 prakṛtyā viṣamā devī kṛtā tena samā katham
GP10bhp_04u:1612: BhP_04.17.004/2 tasya medhyaṃ hayaṃ devaḥ kasya hetor apāharat
GP10bhp_04u:1614: BhP_04.17.005/2 labdhvā jñānaṃ sa-vijñānaṃ rājarṣiḥ kāṃ gatiṃ gataḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1615: BhP_04.17.006/1 yac cānyad api kṛṣṇasya bhavān bhagavataḥ prabhoḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1617: BhP_04.17.007/1 bhaktāya me 'nuraktāya tava cādhokṣajasya ca
GP10bhp_04u:1618: BhP_04.17.007/2 vaktum arhasi yo 'duhyad vainya-rūpeṇa gām imām
GP10bhp_04u:1621: BhP_04.17.008/2 praśasya taṃ prīta-manā maitreyaḥ pratyabhāṣata
GP10bhp_04u:1623: BhP_04.17.009/1 yadābhiṣiktaḥ pṛthur aṅga viprair āmantrito janatāyāś ca pālaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1624: BhP_04.17.009/2 prajā niranne kṣiti-pṛṣṭha etya kṣut-kṣāma-dehāḥ patim abhyavocan
GP10bhp_04u:1625: BhP_04.17.010/1 vayaṃ rājañ jāṭhareṇābhitaptā yathāgninā koṭara-sthena vṛkṣāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1626: BhP_04.17.010/2 tvām adya yātāḥ śaraṇaṃ śaraṇyaṃ yaḥ sādhito vṛtti-karaḥ patir naḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1627: BhP_04.17.011/1 tan no bhavān īhatu rātave 'nnaṃ kṣudhārditānāṃ naradeva-deva
GP10bhp_04u:1628: BhP_04.17.011/2 yāvan na naṅkṣyāmaha ujjhitorjā vārtā-patis tvaṃ kila loka-pālaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1630: BhP_04.17.012/1 pṛthuḥ prajānāṃ karuṇaṃ niśamya paridevitam
GP10bhp_04u:1631: BhP_04.17.012/2 dīrghaṃ dadhyau kuruśreṣṭha nimittaṃ so 'nvapadyata
GP10bhp_04u:1633: BhP_04.17.013/2 sandadhe viśikhaṃ bhūmeḥ kruddhas tripura-hā yathā
GP10bhp_04u:1634: BhP_04.17.014/1 pravepamānā dharaṇī niśāmyodāyudhaṃ ca tam
GP10bhp_04u:1635: BhP_04.17.014/2 gauḥ saty apādravad bhītā mṛgīva mṛgayu-drutā
GP10bhp_04u:1636: BhP_04.17.015/1 tām anvadhāvat tad vainyaḥ kupito 'tyaruṇekṣaṇaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1637: BhP_04.17.015/2 śaraṃ dhanuṣi sandhāya yatra yatra palāyate
GP10bhp_04u:1638: BhP_04.17.016/1 sā diśo vidiśo devī rodasī cāntaraṃ tayoḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1640: BhP_04.17.017/1 loke nāvindata trāṇaṃ vainyān mṛtyor iva prajāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1641: BhP_04.17.017/2 trastā tadā nivavṛte hṛdayena vidūyatā
GP10bhp_04u:1643: BhP_04.17.018/2 trāhi mām api bhūtānāṃ pālane 'vasthito bhavān
GP10bhp_04u:1644: BhP_04.17.019/1 sa tvaṃ jighāṃsase kasmād dīnām akṛta-kilbiṣām
GP10bhp_04u:1645: BhP_04.17.019/2 ahaniṣyat kathaṃ yoṣāṃ dharma-jña iti yo mataḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1646: BhP_04.17.020/1 praharanti na vai strīṣu kṛtāgaḥsv api jantavaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1647: BhP_04.17.020/2 kim uta tvad-vidhā rājan karuṇā dīna-vatsalāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1648: BhP_04.17.021/1 māṃ vipāṭyājarāṃ nāvaṃ yatra viśvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GP10bhp_04u:1649: BhP_04.17.021/2 ātmānaṃ ca prajāś cemāḥ katham ambhasi dhāsyasi
GP10bhp_04u:1652: BhP_04.17.022/2 bhāgaṃ barhiṣi yā vṛṅkte na tanoti ca no vasu
GP10bhp_04u:1653: BhP_04.17.023/1 yavasaṃ jagdhy anudinaṃ naiva dogdhy audhasaṃ payaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1654: BhP_04.17.023/2 tasyām evaṃ hi duṣṭāyāṃ daṇḍo nātra na śasyate
GP10bhp_04u:1655: BhP_04.17.024/1 tvaṃ khalv oṣadhi-bījāni prāk sṛṣṭāni svayambhuvā
GP10bhp_04u:1656: BhP_04.17.024/2 na muñcasy ātma-ruddhāni mām avajñāya manda-dhīḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1658: BhP_04.17.025/2 śamayiṣyāmi mad-bāṇair bhinnāyās tava medasā
GP10bhp_04u:1659: BhP_04.17.026/1 pumān yoṣid uta klība ātma-sambhāvano 'dhamaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1661: BhP_04.17.027/1 tvāṃ stabdhāṃ durmadāṃ nītvā māyā-gāṃ tilaśaḥ śaraiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1663: BhP_04.17.028/1 evaṃ manyumayīṃ mūrtiṃ kṛtāntam iva bibhratam
GP10bhp_04u:1664: BhP_04.17.028/2 praṇatā prāñjaliḥ prāha mahī sañjāta-vepathuḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1666: BhP_04.17.029/1 namaḥ parasmai puruṣāya māyayā vinyasta-nānā-tanave guṇātmane
GP10bhp_04u:1668: BhP_04.17.030/1 yenāham ātmāyatanaṃ vinirmitā dhātrā yato 'yaṃ guṇa-sarga-saṅgrahaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1669: BhP_04.17.030/2 sa eva māṃ hantum udāyudhaḥ svarāḍ upasthito 'nyaṃ śaraṇaṃ kam āśraye
GP10bhp_04u:1670: BhP_04.17.031/1 ya etad ādāv asṛjac carācaraṃ sva-māyayātmāśrayayāvitarkyayā
GP10bhp_04u:1671: BhP_04.17.031/2 tayaiva so 'yaṃ kila goptum udyataḥ kathaṃ nu māṃ dharma-paro jighāṃsati
GP10bhp_04u:1672: BhP_04.17.032/1 nūnaṃ bateśasya samīhitaṃ janais tan-māyayā durjayayākṛtātmabhiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1673: BhP_04.17.032/2 na lakṣyate yas tv akarod akārayad yo 'neka ekaḥ parataś ca īśvaraḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1675: BhP_04.17.033/2 tasmai samunnaddha-niruddha-śaktaye namaḥ parasmai puruṣāya vedhase
GP10bhp_04u:1676: BhP_04.17.034/1 sa vai bhavān ātma-vinirmitaṃ jagad bhūtendriyāntaḥ-karaṇātmakaṃ vibho
GP10bhp_04u:1677: BhP_04.17.034/2 saṃsthāpayiṣyann aja māṃ rasātalād abhyujjahārāmbhasa ādi-sūkaraḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1678: BhP_04.17.035/1 apām upasthe mayi nāvy avasthitāḥ prajā bhavān adya rirakṣiṣuḥ kila
GP10bhp_04u:1679: BhP_04.17.035/2 sa vīra-mūrtiḥ samabhūd dharā-dharo yo māṃ payasy ugra-śaro jighāṃsasi
GP10bhp_04u:1680: BhP_04.17.036/1 nūnaṃ janair īhitam īśvarāṇām asmad-vidhais tad-guṇa-sarga-māyayā
GP10bhp_04u:1681: BhP_04.17.036/2 na jñāyate mohita-citta-vartmabhis tebhyo namo vīra-yaśas-karebhyaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1683: BhP_04.18.001/1 itthaṃ pṛthum abhiṣṭūya ruṣā prasphuritādharam
GP10bhp_04u:1684: BhP_04.18.001/2 punar āhāvanir bhītā saṃstabhyātmānam ātmanā
GP10bhp_04u:1685: BhP_04.18.002/1 sanniyacchābhibho manyuṃ nibodha śrāvitaṃ ca me
GP10bhp_04u:1686: BhP_04.18.002/2 sarvataḥ sāram ādatte yathā madhu-karo budhaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1688: BhP_04.18.003/2 dṛṣṭā yogāḥ prayuktāś ca puṃsāṃ śreyaḥ-prasiddhaye
GP10bhp_04u:1689: BhP_04.18.004/1 tān ātiṣṭhati yaḥ samyag upāyān pūrva-darśitān
GP10bhp_04u:1691: BhP_04.18.005/1 tān anādṛtya yo 'vidvān arthān ārabhate svayam
GP10bhp_04u:1692: BhP_04.18.005/2 tasya vyabhicaranty arthā ārabdhāś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1693: BhP_04.18.006/1 purā sṛṣṭā hy oṣadhayo brahmaṇā yā viśāmpate
GP10bhp_04u:1694: BhP_04.18.006/2 bhujyamānā mayā dṛṣṭā asadbhir adhṛta-vrataiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1697: BhP_04.18.008/1 nūnaṃ tā vīrudhaḥ kṣīṇā mayi kālena bhūyasā
GP10bhp_04u:1698: BhP_04.18.008/2 tatra yogena dṛṣṭena bhavān ādātum arhati
GP10bhp_04u:1699: BhP_04.18.009/1 vatsaṃ kalpaya me vīra yenāhaṃ vatsalā tava
GP10bhp_04u:1700: BhP_04.18.009/2 dhokṣye kṣīramayān kāmān anurūpaṃ ca dohanam
GP10bhp_04u:1701: BhP_04.18.010/1 dogdhāraṃ ca mahā-bāho bhūtānāṃ bhūta-bhāvana
GP10bhp_04u:1702: BhP_04.18.010/2 annam īpsitam ūrjasvad bhagavān vāñchate yadi
GP10bhp_04u:1703: BhP_04.18.011/1 samāṃ ca kuru māṃ rājan deva-vṛṣṭaṃ yathā payaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1704: BhP_04.18.011/2 apartāv api bhadraṃ te upāvarteta me vibho
GP10bhp_04u:1705: BhP_04.18.012/1 iti priyaṃ hitaṃ vākyaṃ bhuva ādāya bhūpatiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1706: BhP_04.18.012/2 vatsaṃ kṛtvā manuṃ pāṇāv aduhat sakalauṣadhīḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1707: BhP_04.18.013/1 tathāpare ca sarvatra sāram ādadate budhāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1708: BhP_04.18.013/2 tato 'nye ca yathā-kāmaṃ duduhuḥ pṛthu-bhāvitām
GP10bhp_04u:1709: BhP_04.18.014/1 ṛṣayo duduhur devīm indriyeṣv atha sattama
GP10bhp_04u:1710: BhP_04.18.014/2 vatsaṃ bṛhaspatiṃ kṛtvā payaś chandomayaṃ śuci
GP10bhp_04u:1711: BhP_04.18.015/1 kṛtvā vatsaṃ sura-gaṇā indraṃ somam adūduhan
GP10bhp_04u:1712: BhP_04.18.015/2 hiraṇmayena pātreṇa vīryam ojo balaṃ payaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1713: BhP_04.18.016/1 daiteyā dānavā vatsaṃ prahlādam asurarṣabham
GP10bhp_04u:1716: BhP_04.18.017/2 vatsaṃ viśvāvasuṃ kṛtvā gāndharvaṃ madhu saubhagam
GP10bhp_04u:1717: BhP_04.18.018/1 vatsena pitaro 'ryamṇā kavyaṃ kṣīram adhukṣata
GP10bhp_04u:1719: BhP_04.18.019/1 prakalpya vatsaṃ kapilaṃ siddhāḥ saṅkalpanāmayīm
GP10bhp_04u:1720: BhP_04.18.019/2 siddhiṃ nabhasi vidyāṃ ca ye ca vidyādharādayaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1721: BhP_04.18.020/1 anye ca māyino māyām antardhānādbhutātmanām
GP10bhp_04u:1722: BhP_04.18.020/2 mayaṃ prakalpya vatsaṃ te duduhur dhāraṇāmayīm
GP10bhp_04u:1725: BhP_04.18.022/1 tathāhayo dandaśūkāḥ sarpā nāgāś ca takṣakam
GP10bhp_04u:1726: BhP_04.18.022/2 vidhāya vatsaṃ duduhur bila-pātre viṣaṃ payaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1727: BhP_04.18.023/1 paśavo yavasaṃ kṣīraṃ vatsaṃ kṛtvā ca go-vṛṣam
GP10bhp_04u:1728: BhP_04.18.023/2 araṇya-pātre cādhukṣan mṛgendreṇa ca daṃṣṭriṇaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1729: BhP_04.18.024/1 kravyādāḥ prāṇinaḥ kravyaṃ duduhuḥ sve kalevare
GP10bhp_04u:1730: BhP_04.18.024/2 suparṇa-vatsā vihagāś caraṃ cācaram eva ca
GP10bhp_04u:1731: BhP_04.18.025/1 vaṭa-vatsā vanaspatayaḥ pṛthag rasamayaṃ payaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1733: BhP_04.18.026/1 sarve sva-mukhya-vatsena sve sve pātre pṛthak payaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1735: BhP_04.18.027/1 evaṃ pṛthv-ādayaḥ pṛthvīm annādāḥ svannam ātmanaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1737: BhP_04.18.028/1 tato mahīpatiḥ prītaḥ sarva-kāma-dughāṃ pṛthuḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1740: BhP_04.18.029/2 bhū-maṇḍalam idaṃ vainyaḥ prāyaś cakre samaṃ vibhuḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1741: BhP_04.18.030/1 athāsmin bhagavān vainyaḥ prajānāṃ vṛttidaḥ pitā
GP10bhp_04u:1742: BhP_04.18.030/2 nivāsān kalpayāṃ cakre tatra tatra yathārhataḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1743: BhP_04.18.031/1 grāmān puraḥ pattanāni durgāṇi vividhāni ca
GP10bhp_04u:1744: BhP_04.18.031/2 ghoṣān vrajān sa-śibirān ākarān kheṭa-kharvaṭān
GP10bhp_04u:1745: BhP_04.18.032/1 prāk pṛthor iha naivaiṣā pura-grāmādi-kalpanā
GP10bhp_04u:1746: BhP_04.18.032/2 yathā-sukhaṃ vasanti sma tatra tatrākutobhayāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1748: BhP_04.19.001/1 athādīkṣata rājā tu hayamedha-śatena saḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1749: BhP_04.19.001/2 brahmāvarte manoḥ kṣetre yatra prācī sarasvatī
GP10bhp_04u:1750: BhP_04.19.002/1 tad abhipretya bhagavān karmātiśayam ātmanaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1751: BhP_04.19.002/2 śata-kratur na mamṛṣe pṛthor yajña-mahotsavam
GP10bhp_04u:1752: BhP_04.19.003/1 yatra yajña-patiḥ sākṣād bhagavān harir īśvaraḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1756: BhP_04.19.005/1 siddhā vidyādharā daityā dānavā guhyakādayaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1758: BhP_04.19.006/1 kapilo nārado datto yogeśāḥ sanakādayaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1759: BhP_04.19.006/2 tam anvīyur bhāgavatā ye ca tat-sevanotsukāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1760: BhP_04.19.007/1 yatra dharma-dughā bhūmiḥ sarva-kāma-dughā satī
GP10bhp_04u:1761: BhP_04.19.007/2 dogdhi smābhīpsitān arthān yajamānasya bhārata
GP10bhp_04u:1765: BhP_04.19.009/2 upāyanam upājahruḥ sarve lokāḥ sa-pālakāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1766: BhP_04.19.010/1 iti cādhokṣajeśasya pṛthos tu paramodayam
GP10bhp_04u:1767: BhP_04.19.010/2 asūyan bhagavān indraḥ pratighātam acīkarat

GP10bhp_04u:2226: BhP_04.23.026/1 saiṣā nūnaṃ vrajaty ūrdhvam anu vainyaṃ patiṃ satī

GP10bhp_04u:2230: BhP_04.23.028/1 sa vañcito batātma-dhruk kṛcchreṇa mahatā bhuvi

GP10bhp_04u:2234: BhP_04.23.029/2 yaṃ vā ātma-vidāṃ dhuryo vainyaḥ prāpācyutāśrayaḥ

GP10bhp_04u:2241: BhP_04.23.033/1 triḥ kṛtva idam ākarṇya naro nāry athavādṛtā
GP10bhp_04u:2243: BhP_04.23.034/1 aspaṣṭa-kīrtiḥ suyaśā mūrkho bhavati paṇḍitaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2245: BhP_04.23.035/1 dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ svargyaṃ kali-malāpaham
GP10bhp_04u:2247: BhP_04.23.035/3 śraddhayaitad anuśrāvyaṃ caturṇāṃ kāraṇaṃ param
GP10bhp_04u:2248: BhP_04.23.036/1 vijayābhimukho rājā śrutvaitad abhiyāti yān

GP10bhp_04u:2254: BhP_04.23.039/1 anudinam idam ādareṇa śṛṇvan pṛthu-caritaṃ prathayan vimukta-saṅgaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2255: BhP_04.23.039/2 bhagavati bhava-sindhu-pota-pāde sa ca nipuṇāṃ labhate ratiṃ manuṣyaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2260: BhP_04.24.002/2 pratīcīṃ vṛka-saṃjñāya turyāṃ draviṇase vibhuḥ

GP10bhp_04u:2266: BhP_04.24.005/2 ya indram aśva-hartāraṃ vidvān api na jaghnivān

GP10bhp_04u:2269: BhP_04.24.007/1 tatrāpi haṃsaṃ puruṣaṃ paramātmānam ātma-dṛk
GP10bhp_04u:2270: BhP_04.24.007/2 yajaṃs tal-lokatām āpa kuśalena samādhinā
GP10bhp_04u:2271: BhP_04.24.008/1 havirdhānād dhavirdhānī vidurāsūta ṣaṭ sutān
GP10bhp_04u:2272: BhP_04.24.008/2 barhiṣadaṃ gayaṃ śuklaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ satyaṃ jitavratam

GP10bhp_04u:2279: BhP_04.24.011/3 parikramantīm udvāhe cakame 'gniḥ śukīm iva

GP10bhp_04u:2291: BhP_04.24.017/1 saṅgamaḥ khalu viprarṣe śiveneha śarīriṇām

GP10bhp_04u:2293: BhP_04.24.018/1 ātmārāmo 'pi yas tv asya loka-kalpasya rādhase
GP10bhp_04u:2294: BhP_04.24.018/2 śaktyā yukto vicarati ghorayā bhagavān bhavaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2296: BhP_04.24.019/1 pracetasaḥ pitur vākyaṃ śirasādāya sādhavaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2297: BhP_04.24.019/2 diśaṃ pratīcīṃ prayayus tapasy ādṛta-cetasaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2298: BhP_04.24.020/1 sa-samudram upa vistīrṇam apaśyan sumahat saraḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2305: BhP_04.24.023/2 visismyū rāja-putrās te mṛdaṅga-paṇavādy anu
GP10bhp_04u:2306: BhP_04.24.024/1 tarhy eva sarasas tasmān niṣkrāmantaṃ sahānugam
GP10bhp_04u:2310: BhP_04.24.026/1 sa tān prapannārti-haro bhagavān dharma-vatsalaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2311: BhP_04.24.026/2 dharma-jñān śīla-sampannān prītaḥ prītān uvāca ha
GP10bhp_04u:2313: BhP_04.24.027/1 yūyaṃ vediṣadaḥ putrā viditaṃ vaś cikīrṣitam
GP10bhp_04u:2314: BhP_04.24.027/2 anugrahāya bhadraṃ va evaṃ me darśanaṃ kṛtam
GP10bhp_04u:2315: BhP_04.24.028/1 yaḥ paraṃ raṃhasaḥ sākṣāt tri-guṇāj jīva-saṃjñitāt
GP10bhp_04u:2316: BhP_04.24.028/2 bhagavantaṃ vāsudevaṃ prapannaḥ sa priyo hi me
GP10bhp_04u:2317: BhP_04.24.029/1 sva-dharma-niṣṭhaḥ śata-janmabhiḥ pumān viriñcatām eti tataḥ paraṃ hi mām
GP10bhp_04u:2318: BhP_04.24.029/2 avyākṛtaṃ bhāgavato 'tha vaiṣṇavaṃ padaṃ yathāhaṃ vibudhāḥ kalātyaye
GP10bhp_04u:2319: BhP_04.24.030/1 atha bhāgavatā yūyaṃ priyāḥ stha bhagavān yathā
GP10bhp_04u:2320: BhP_04.24.030/2 na mad bhāgavatānāṃ ca preyān anyo 'sti karhicit
GP10bhp_04u:2321: BhP_04.24.031/1 idaṃ viviktaṃ japtavyaṃ pavitraṃ maṅgalaṃ param
GP10bhp_04u:2322: BhP_04.24.031/2 niḥśreyasa-karaṃ cāpi śrūyatāṃ tad vadāmi vaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2324: BhP_04.24.032/1 ity anukrośa-hṛdayo bhagavān āha tāñ chivaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2327: BhP_04.24.033/1 jitaṃ ta ātma-vid-varya- svastaye svastir astu me
GP10bhp_04u:2328: BhP_04.24.033/2 bhavatārādhasā rāddhaṃ sarvasmā ātmane namaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2337: BhP_04.24.038/1 nama ūrja iṣe trayyāḥ pataye yajña-retase
GP10bhp_04u:2338: BhP_04.24.038/2 tṛpti-dāya ca jīvānāṃ namaḥ sarva-rasātmane
GP10bhp_04u:2340: BhP_04.24.039/2 namas trailokya-pālāya saha ojo-balāya ca

GP10bhp_04u:2372: BhP_04.24.055/1 taṃ durārādhyam ārādhya satām api durāpayā
GP10bhp_04u:2373: BhP_04.24.055/2 ekānta-bhaktyā ko vāñchet pāda-mūlaṃ vinā bahiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2374: BhP_04.24.056/1 yatra nirviṣṭam araṇaṃ kṛtānto nābhimanyate

GP10bhp_04u:2379: BhP_04.24.058/2 bhūteṣv anukrośa-susattva-śīlināṃ syāt saṅgamo 'nugraha eṣa nas tava
GP10bhp_04u:2380: BhP_04.24.059/1 na yasya cittaṃ bahir-artha-vibhramaṃ tamo-guhāyāṃ ca viśuddham āviśat

GP10bhp_04u:2383: BhP_04.24.060/2 tat tvaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotir ākāśam iva vistṛtam
GP10bhp_04u:2384: BhP_04.24.061/1 yo māyayedaṃ puru-rūpayāsṛjad bibharti bhūyaḥ kṣapayaty avikriyaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2385: BhP_04.24.061/2 yad-bheda-buddhiḥ sad ivātma-duḥsthayā tvam ātma-tantraṃ bhagavan pratīmahi
GP10bhp_04u:2386: BhP_04.24.062/1 kriyā-kalāpair idam eva yoginaḥ śraddhānvitāḥ sādhu yajanti siddhaye
GP10bhp_04u:2387: BhP_04.24.062/2 bhūtendriyāntaḥ-karaṇopalakṣitaṃ vede ca tantre ca ta eva kovidāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2388: BhP_04.24.063/1 tvam eka ādyaḥ puruṣaḥ supta-śaktis tayā rajaḥ-sattva-tamo vibhidyate
GP10bhp_04u:2389: BhP_04.24.063/2 mahān ahaṃ khaṃ marud agni-vār-dharāḥ surarṣayo bhūta-gaṇā idaṃ yataḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2390: BhP_04.24.064/1 sṛṣṭaṃ sva-śaktyedam anupraviṣṭaś catur-vidhaṃ puram ātmāṃśakena
GP10bhp_04u:2391: BhP_04.24.064/2 atho vidus taṃ puruṣaṃ santam antar bhuṅkte hṛṣīkair madhu sāra-ghaṃ yaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2392: BhP_04.24.065/1 sa eṣa lokān aticaṇḍa-vego vikarṣasi tvaṃ khalu kāla-yānaḥ

GP10bhp_04u:2398: BhP_04.24.068/1 atha tvam asi no brahman paramātman vipaścitām
GP10bhp_04u:2400: BhP_04.24.069/1 idaṃ japata bhadraṃ vo viśuddhā nṛpa-nandanāḥ

GP10bhp_04u:2408: BhP_04.24.073/1 te vayaṃ noditāḥ sarve prajā-sarge prajeśvarāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2409: BhP_04.24.073/2 anena dhvasta-tamasaḥ sisṛkṣmo vividhāḥ prajāḥ

GP10bhp_04u:2414: BhP_04.24.076/1 ya imaṃ śraddhayā yukto mad-gītaṃ bhagavat-stavam
GP10bhp_04u:2415: BhP_04.24.076/2 adhīyāno durārādhyaṃ harim ārādhayaty asau
GP10bhp_04u:2416: BhP_04.24.077/1 vindate puruṣo 'muṣmād yad yad icchaty asatvaram
GP10bhp_04u:2418: BhP_04.24.078/1 idaṃ yaḥ kalya utthāya prāñjaliḥ śraddhayānvitaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2419: BhP_04.24.078/2 śṛṇuyāc chrāvayen martyo mucyate karma-bandhanaiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2420: BhP_04.24.079/1 gītaṃ mayedaṃ naradeva-nandanāḥ parasya puṃsaḥ paramātmanaḥ stavam
GP10bhp_04u:2421: BhP_04.24.079/2 japanta ekāgra-dhiyas tapo mahat caradhvam ante tata āpsyathepsitam
GP10bhp_04u:2423: BhP_04.25.001/1 iti sandiśya bhagavān bārhiṣadair abhipūjitaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2425: BhP_04.25.002/1 rudra-gītaṃ bhagavataḥ stotraṃ sarve pracetasaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2426: BhP_04.25.002/2 japantas te tapas tepur varṣāṇām ayutaṃ jale
GP10bhp_04u:2429: BhP_04.25.004/1 śreyas tvaṃ katamad rājan karmaṇātmana īhase
GP10bhp_04u:2430: BhP_04.25.004/2 duḥkha-hāniḥ sukhāvāptiḥ śreyas tan neha ceṣyate
GP10bhp_04u:2432: BhP_04.25.005/1 na jānāmi mahā-bhāga paraṃ karmāpaviddha-dhīḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2433: BhP_04.25.005/2 brūhi me vimalaṃ jñānaṃ yena mucyeya karmabhiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2435: BhP_04.25.006/2 na paraṃ vindate mūḍho bhrāmyan saṃsāra-vartmasu
GP10bhp_04u:2437: BhP_04.25.007/1 bho bhoḥ prajāpate rājan paśūn paśya tvayādhvare
GP10bhp_04u:2439: BhP_04.25.008/1 ete tvāṃ sampratīkṣante smaranto vaiśasaṃ tava
GP10bhp_04u:2441: BhP_04.25.009/1 atra te kathayiṣye 'mum itihāsaṃ purātanam
GP10bhp_04u:2442: BhP_04.25.009/2 purañjanasya caritaṃ nibodha gadato mama
GP10bhp_04u:2443: BhP_04.25.010/1 āsīt purañjano nāma rājā rājan bṛhac-chravāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2445: BhP_04.25.011/1 so 'nveṣamāṇaḥ śaraṇaṃ babhrāma pṛthivīṃ prabhuḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2446: BhP_04.25.011/2 nānurūpaṃ yadāvindad abhūt sa vimanā iva
GP10bhp_04u:2447: BhP_04.25.012/1 na sādhu mene tāḥ sarvā bhūtale yāvatīḥ puraḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2449: BhP_04.25.013/1 sa ekadā himavato dakṣiṇeṣv atha sānuṣu
GP10bhp_04u:2450: BhP_04.25.013/2 dadarśa navabhir dvārbhiḥ puraṃ lakṣita-lakṣaṇām
GP10bhp_04u:2452: BhP_04.25.014/2 svarṇa-raupyāyasaiḥ śṛṅgaiḥ saṅkulāṃ sarvato gṛhaiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2454: BhP_04.25.015/2 kḷpta-harmya-sthalīṃ dīptāṃ śriyā bhogavatīm iva
GP10bhp_04u:2462: BhP_04.25.019/2 āhūtaṃ manyate pāntho yatra kokila-kūjitaiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2467: BhP_04.25.022/1 sunāsāṃ sudatīṃ bālāṃ sukapolāṃ varānanām
GP10bhp_04u:2470: BhP_04.25.023/2 padbhyāṃ kvaṇadbhyāṃ calantīṃ nūpurair devatām iva
