GP10bhp_04u:2907: BhP_04.29.049/3 tat karma hari-toṣaṃ yat sā vidyā tan-matir yayā
GP10bhp_04u:2908: BhP_04.29.050/1 harir deha-bhṛtām ātmā svayaṃ prakṛtir īśvaraḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2909: BhP_04.29.050/2 tat-pāda-mūlaṃ śaraṇaṃ yataḥ kṣemo nṛṇām iha
GP10bhp_04u:2910: BhP_04.29.051/1 sa vai priyatamaś cātmā yato na bhayam aṇv api
GP10bhp_04u:2911: BhP_04.29.051/2 iti veda sa vai vidvān yo vidvān sa gurur hariḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2913: BhP_04.29.052/1 praśna evaṃ hi sañchinno bhavataḥ puruṣarṣabha
GP10bhp_04u:2914: BhP_04.29.052/2 atra me vadato guhyaṃ niśāmaya suniścitam
GP10bhp_04u:2915: BhP_04.29.053/1 kṣudraṃ caraṃ sumanasāṃ śaraṇe mithitvā
GP10bhp_04u:2919: BhP_04.29.054 /1 asyārthaḥ sumanaḥ-sama-dharmaṇāṃ strīṇāṃ śaraṇa āśrame puṣpa-madhu-gandhavat
GP10bhp_04u:2922: atitarām atipralobhita-karṇam agre vṛka-yūthavad ātmana āyur harato 'ho-rātrān tān
GP10bhp_04u:2923: kāla-lava-viśeṣān avigaṇayya gṛheṣu viharantaṃ pṛṣṭhata eva parokṣam anupravṛtto
GP10bhp_04u:2924: lubdhakaḥ kṛtānto 'ntaḥ śareṇa yam iha parāvidhyati tam imam ātmānam aho rājan bhinna-hṛdayaṃ draṣṭum arhasīti
GP10bhp_04u:2925: BhP_04.29.055/1 sa tvaṃ vicakṣya mṛga-ceṣṭitam ātmano 'ntaś
GP10bhp_04u:2926: BhP_04.29.055/2 cittaṃ niyaccha hṛdi karṇa-dhunīṃ ca citte
GP10bhp_04u:2930: BhP_04.29.056/1 śrutam anvīkṣitaṃ brahman bhagavān yad abhāṣata
GP10bhp_04u:2931: BhP_04.29.056/2 naitaj jānanty upādhyāyāḥ kiṃ na brūyur vidur yadi
GP10bhp_04u:2932: BhP_04.29.057/1 saṃśayo 'tra tu me vipra sañchinnas tat-kṛto mahān
GP10bhp_04u:2933: BhP_04.29.057/2 ṛṣayo 'pi hi muhyanti yatra nendriya-vṛttayaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2934: BhP_04.29.058/1 karmāṇy ārabhate yena pumān iha vihāya tam
GP10bhp_04u:2935: BhP_04.29.058/2 amutrānyena dehena juṣṭāni sa yad aśnute
GP10bhp_04u:2936: BhP_04.29.059/1 iti veda-vidāṃ vādaḥ śrūyate tatra tatra ha
GP10bhp_04u:2937: BhP_04.29.059/2 karma yat kriyate proktaṃ parokṣaṃ na prakāśate
GP10bhp_04u:2939: BhP_04.29.060/1 yenaivārabhate karma tenaivāmutra tat pumān
GP10bhp_04u:2940: BhP_04.29.060/2 bhuṅkte hy avyavadhānena liṅgena manasā svayam
GP10bhp_04u:2941: BhP_04.29.061/1 śayānam imam utsṛjya śvasantaṃ puruṣo yathā
GP10bhp_04u:2942: BhP_04.29.061/2 karmātmany āhitaṃ bhuṅkte tādṛśenetareṇa vā
GP10bhp_04u:2943: BhP_04.29.062/1 mamaite manasā yad yad asāv aham iti bruvan
GP10bhp_04u:2944: BhP_04.29.062/2 gṛhṇīyāt tat pumān rāddhaṃ karma yena punar bhavaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2946: BhP_04.29.063/2 evaṃ prāg-dehajaṃ karma lakṣyate citta-vṛttibhiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2947: BhP_04.29.064/1 nānubhūtaṃ kva cānena dehenādṛṣṭam aśrutam
GP10bhp_04u:2948: BhP_04.29.064/2 kadācid upalabhyeta yad rūpaṃ yādṛg ātmani
GP10bhp_04u:2949: BhP_04.29.065/1 tenāsya tādṛśaṃ rāja liṅgino deha-sambhavam
GP10bhp_04u:2950: BhP_04.29.065/2 śraddhatsvānanubhūto 'rtho na manaḥ spraṣṭum arhati
GP10bhp_04u:2951: BhP_04.29.066/1 mana eva manuṣyasya pūrva-rūpāṇi śaṃsati
GP10bhp_04u:2952: BhP_04.29.066/2 bhaviṣyataś ca bhadraṃ te tathaiva na bhaviṣyataḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2953: BhP_04.29.067/1 adṛṣṭam aśrutaṃ cātra kvacin manasi dṛśyate
GP10bhp_04u:2956: BhP_04.29.068/2 āyānti bahuśo yānti sarve samanaso janāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2959: BhP_04.29.070/1 nāhaṃ mameti bhāvo 'yaṃ puruṣe vyavadhīyate
GP10bhp_04u:2960: BhP_04.29.070/2 yāvad buddhi-mano-'kṣārtha- guṇa-vyūho hy anādimān
GP10bhp_04u:2962: BhP_04.29.071/2 nehate 'ham iti jñānaṃ mṛtyu-prajvārayor api
GP10bhp_04u:2963: BhP_04.29.072/1 garbhe bālye 'py apauṣkalyād ekādaśa-vidhaṃ tadā
GP10bhp_04u:2964: BhP_04.29.072/2 liṅgaṃ na dṛśyate yūnaḥ kuhvāṃ candramaso yathā
GP10bhp_04u:2965: BhP_04.29.073/1 arthe hy avidyamāne 'pi saṃsṛtir na nivartate
GP10bhp_04u:2966: BhP_04.29.073/2 dhyāyato viṣayān asya svapne 'narthāgamo yathā
GP10bhp_04u:2967: BhP_04.29.074/1 evaṃ pañca-vidhaṃ liṅgaṃ tri-vṛt ṣoḍaśa vistṛtam
GP10bhp_04u:2968: BhP_04.29.074/2 eṣa cetanayā yukto jīva ity abhidhīyate
GP10bhp_04u:2969: BhP_04.29.075/1 anena puruṣo dehān upādatte vimuñcati
GP10bhp_04u:2970: BhP_04.29.075/2 harṣaṃ śokaṃ bhayaṃ duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ cānena vindati
GP10bhp_04u:2971: BhP_04.29.076/1 bhaktiḥ kṛṣṇe dayā jīveṣv akuṇṭha-jñānam ātmani
GP10bhp_04u:2972: BhP_04.29.076/2 yadi syād ātmano bhūyād apavargas tu saṃsṛteḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2973: BhP_04.29.076/1 yathā tṛṇa-jalūkeyaṃ nāpayāty apayāti ca
GP10bhp_04u:2974: BhP_04.29.076/2 na tyajen mriyamāṇo 'pi prāg-dehābhimatiṃ janaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2975: BhP_04.29.077/1 adṛṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭavan naṅkṣed bhūtaṃ svapnavad anyathā
GP10bhp_04u:2976: BhP_04.29.077/2 bhūtaṃ bhavad bhaviṣyac ca suptaṃ sarva-raho-rahaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2977: BhP_04.29.077/1 yāvad anyaṃ na vindeta vyavadhānena karmaṇām
GP10bhp_04u:2978: BhP_04.29.077/2 mana eva manuṣyendra bhūtānāṃ bhava-bhāvanam
GP10bhp_04u:2979: BhP_04.29.078/1 yadākṣaiś caritān dhyāyan karmāṇy ācinute 'sakṛt
GP10bhp_04u:2980: BhP_04.29.078/2 sati karmaṇy avidyāyāṃ bandhaḥ karmaṇy anātmanaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2981: BhP_04.29.079/1 atas tad apavādārthaṃ bhaja sarvātmanā harim
GP10bhp_04u:2982: BhP_04.29.079/2 paśyaṃs tad-ātmakaṃ viśvaṃ sthity-utpatty-apyayā yataḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2984: BhP_04.29.080/1 bhāgavata-mukhyo bhagavān nārado haṃsayor gatim
GP10bhp_04u:2985: BhP_04.29.080/2 pradarśya hy amum āmantrya siddha-lokaṃ tato 'gamat
GP10bhp_04u:2987: BhP_04.29.081/2 ādiśya putrān agamat tapase kapilāśramam
GP10bhp_04u:2991: BhP_04.29.083/2 yaḥ śrāvayed yaḥ śṛṇuyāt sa liṅgena vimucyate
GP10bhp_04u:2997: BhP_04.29.085/2 evaṃ striyāśramaḥ puṃsaś chinno 'mutra ca saṃśayaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2999: BhP_04.30.001/1 ye tvayābhihitā brahman sutāḥ prācīnabarhiṣaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3000: BhP_04.30.001/2 te rudra-gītena hariṃ siddhim āpuḥ pratoṣya kām
GP10bhp_04u:3001: BhP_04.30.002/1 kiṃ bārhaspatyeha paratra vātha kaivalya-nātha-priya-pārśva-vartinaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3002: BhP_04.30.002/2 āsādya devaṃ giriśaṃ yadṛcchayā prāpuḥ paraṃ nūnam atha pracetasaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3007: BhP_04.30.004/2 teṣām āvirabhūt kṛcchraṃ śāntena śamayan rucā
GP10bhp_04u:3009: BhP_04.30.005/2 pīta-vāsā maṇi-grīvaḥ kurvan vitimirā diśaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3016: BhP_04.30.007/3 barhiṣmataḥ puruṣa āha sutān prapannān
GP10bhp_04u:3019: BhP_04.30.008/1 varaṃ vṛṇīdhvaṃ bhadraṃ vo yūyaṃ me nṛpa-nandanāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3021: BhP_04.30.009/1 yo 'nusmarati sandhyāyāṃ yuṣmān anudinaṃ naraḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3022: BhP_04.30.009/2 tasya bhrātṛṣv ātma-sāmyaṃ tathā bhūteṣu sauhṛdam
GP10bhp_04u:3023: BhP_04.30.010/1 ye tu māṃ rudra-gītena sāyaṃ prātaḥ samāhitāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3024: BhP_04.30.010/2 stuvanty ahaṃ kāma-varān dāsye prajñāṃ ca śobhanām
GP10bhp_04u:3025: BhP_04.30.011/1 yad yūyaṃ pitur ādeśam agrahīṣṭa mudānvitāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3026: BhP_04.30.011/2 atho va uśatī kīrtir lokān anu bhaviṣyati
GP10bhp_04u:3027: BhP_04.30.012/1 bhavitā viśrutaḥ putro 'navamo brahmaṇo guṇaiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3028: BhP_04.30.012/2 ya etām ātma-vīryeṇa tri-lokīṃ pūrayiṣyati
GP10bhp_04u:3029: BhP_04.30.013/1 kaṇḍoḥ pramlocayā labdhā kanyā kamala-locanā
GP10bhp_04u:3030: BhP_04.30.013/2 tāṃ cāpaviddhāṃ jagṛhur bhūruhā nṛpa-nandanāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3031: BhP_04.30.014/1 kṣut-kṣāmāyā mukhe rājā somaḥ pīyūṣa-varṣiṇīm
GP10bhp_04u:3032: BhP_04.30.014/2 deśinīṃ rodamānāyā nidadhe sa dayānvitaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3033: BhP_04.30.015/1 prajā-visarga ādiṣṭāḥ pitrā mām anuvartatā
GP10bhp_04u:3034: BhP_04.30.015/2 tatra kanyāṃ varārohāṃ tām udvahata mā ciram
GP10bhp_04u:3038: BhP_04.30.017/2 bhaumān bhokṣyatha bhogān vai divyāṃś cānugrahān mama
GP10bhp_04u:3039: BhP_04.30.018/1 atha mayy anapāyinyā bhaktyā pakva-guṇāśayāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3040: BhP_04.30.018/2 upayāsyatha mad-dhāma nirvidya nirayād ataḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3041: BhP_04.30.019/1 gṛheṣv āviśatāṃ cāpi puṃsāṃ kuśala-karmaṇām
GP10bhp_04u:3042: BhP_04.30.019/2 mad-vārtā-yāta-yāmānāṃ na bandhāya gṛhā matāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3043: BhP_04.30.020/1 navyavad dhṛdaye yaj jño brahmaitad brahma-vādibhiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3044: BhP_04.30.020/2 na muhyanti na śocanti na hṛṣyanti yato gatāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3046: BhP_04.30.021/1 evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ puruṣārtha-bhājanaṃ janārdanaṃ prāñjalayaḥ pracetasaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3051: BhP_04.30.023/1 śuddhāya śāntāya namaḥ sva-niṣṭhayā manasy apārthaṃ vilasad-dvayāya
GP10bhp_04u:3056: BhP_04.30.025/2 namaḥ kamala-pādāya namas te kamalekṣaṇa
GP10bhp_04u:3059: BhP_04.30.027/1 rūpaṃ bhagavatā tv etad aśeṣa-kleśa-saṅkṣayam
GP10bhp_04u:3060: BhP_04.30.027/2 āviṣkṛtaṃ naḥ kliṣṭānāṃ kim anyad anukampitam
GP10bhp_04u:3061: BhP_04.30.028/1 etāvat tvaṃ hi vibhubhir bhāvyaṃ dīneṣu vatsalaiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3064: BhP_04.30.029/2 antarhito 'ntar-hṛdaye kasmān no veda nāśiṣaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3065: BhP_04.30.030/1 asāv eva varo 'smākam īpsito jagataḥ pate
GP10bhp_04u:3066: BhP_04.30.030/2 prasanno bhagavān yeṣām apavargaḥ gurur gatiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3067: BhP_04.30.031/1 varaṃ vṛṇīmahe 'thāpi nātha tvat parataḥ parāt
GP10bhp_04u:3068: BhP_04.30.031/2 na hy antas tvad-vibhūtīnāṃ so 'nanta iti gīyase
GP10bhp_04u:3069: BhP_04.30.032/1 pārijāte 'ñjasā labdhe sāraṅgo 'nyan na sevate
GP10bhp_04u:3070: BhP_04.30.032/2 tvad-aṅghri-mūlam āsādya sākṣāt kiṃ kiṃ vṛṇīmahi
GP10bhp_04u:3071: BhP_04.30.033/1 yāvat te māyayā spṛṣṭā bhramāma iha karmabhiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3072: BhP_04.30.033/2 tāvad bhavat-prasaṅgānāṃ saṅgaḥ syān no bhave bhave
GP10bhp_04u:3073: BhP_04.30.034/1 tulayāma lavenāpi na svargaṃ nāpunar-bhavam
GP10bhp_04u:3075: BhP_04.30.035/1 yatreḍyante kathā mṛṣṭās tṛṣṇāyāḥ praśamo yataḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3076: BhP_04.30.035/2 nirvairaṃ yatra bhūteṣu nodvego yatra kaścana
GP10bhp_04u:3077: BhP_04.30.036/1 yatra nārāyaṇaḥ sākṣād bhagavān nyāsināṃ gatiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3078: BhP_04.30.036/2 saṃstūyate sat-kathāsu mukta-saṅgaiḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3079: BhP_04.30.037/1 teṣāṃ vicaratāṃ padbhyāṃ tīrthānāṃ pāvanecchayā
GP10bhp_04u:3080: BhP_04.30.037/2 bhītasya kiṃ na roceta tāvakānāṃ samāgamaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3081: BhP_04.30.038/1 vayaṃ tu sākṣād bhagavan bhavasya priyasya sakhyuḥ kṣaṇa-saṅgamena
GP10bhp_04u:3082: BhP_04.30.038/2 suduścikitsyasya bhavasya mṛtyor bhiṣaktamaṃ tvādya gatiṃ gatāḥ sma
GP10bhp_04u:3083: BhP_04.30.039/1 yan naḥ svadhītaṃ guravaḥ prasāditā viprāś ca vṛddhāś ca sad-ānuvṛttyā
GP10bhp_04u:3084: BhP_04.30.039/2 āryā natāḥ suhṛdo bhrātaraś ca sarvāṇi bhūtāny anasūyayaiva
GP10bhp_04u:3085: BhP_04.30.040/1 yan naḥ sutaptaṃ tapa etad īśa nirandhasāṃ kālam adabhram apsu
GP10bhp_04u:3086: BhP_04.30.040/2 sarvaṃ tad etat puruṣasya bhūmno vṛṇīmahe te paritoṣaṇāya
GP10bhp_04u:3087: BhP_04.30.041/1 manuḥ svayambhūr bhagavān bhavaś ca ye 'nye tapo-jñāna-viśuddha-sattvāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3088: BhP_04.30.041/2 adṛṣṭa-pārā api yan-mahimnaḥ stuvanty atho tvātma-samaṃ gṛṇīmaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3089: BhP_04.30.042/1 namaḥ samāya śuddhāya puruṣāya parāya ca
GP10bhp_04u:3090: BhP_04.30.042/2 vāsudevāya sattvāya tubhyaṃ bhagavate namaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3092: BhP_04.30.043/1 iti pracetobhir abhiṣṭuto hariḥ prītas tathety āha śaraṇya-vatsalaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3093: BhP_04.30.043/2 anicchatāṃ yānam atṛpta-cakṣuṣāṃ yayau sva-dhāmānapavarga-vīryaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3094: BhP_04.30.044/1 atha niryāya salilāt pracetasa udanvataḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3095: BhP_04.30.044/2 vīkṣyākupyan drumaiś channāṃ gāṃ gāṃ roddhum ivocchritaiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3096: BhP_04.30.045/1 tato 'gni-mārutau rājann amuñcan mukhato ruṣā
GP10bhp_04u:3097: BhP_04.30.045/2 mahīṃ nirvīrudhaṃ kartuṃ saṃvartaka ivātyaye
GP10bhp_04u:3098: BhP_04.30.046/1 bhasmasāt kriyamāṇāṃs tān drumān vīkṣya pitāmahaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3099: BhP_04.30.046/2 āgataḥ śamayām āsa putrān barhiṣmato nayaiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3100: BhP_04.30.047/1 tatrāvaśiṣṭā ye vṛkṣā bhītā duhitaraṃ tadā
GP10bhp_04u:3101: BhP_04.30.047/2 ujjahrus te pracetobhya upadiṣṭāḥ svayambhuvā
GP10bhp_04u:3102: BhP_04.30.048/1 te ca brahmaṇa ādeśān māriṣām upayemire
GP10bhp_04u:3104: BhP_04.30.049/1 cākṣuṣe tv antare prāpte prāk-sarge kāla-vidrute
GP10bhp_04u:3105: BhP_04.30.049/2 yaḥ sasarja prajā iṣṭāḥ sa dakṣo daiva-coditaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3106: BhP_04.30.050/1 yo jāyamānaḥ sarveṣāṃ tejas tejasvināṃ rucā
GP10bhp_04u:3107: BhP_04.30.050/2 svayopādatta dākṣyāc ca karmaṇāṃ dakṣam abruvan
GP10bhp_04u:3108: BhP_04.30.051/1 taṃ prajā-sarga-rakṣāyām anādir abhiṣicya ca
GP10bhp_04u:3109: BhP_04.30.051/2 yuyoja yuyuje 'nyāṃś ca sa vai sarva-prajāpatīn
GP10bhp_04u:3112: BhP_04.31.001/2 smaranta ātmaje bhāryāṃ visṛjya prāvrajan gṛhāt
GP10bhp_04u:3114: BhP_04.31.002/2 pratīcyāṃ diśi velāyāṃ siddho 'bhūd yatra jājaliḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3116: BhP_04.31.003/2 pare 'male brahmaṇi yojitātmanaḥ surāsureḍyo dadṛśe sma nāradaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3117: BhP_04.31.004/1 tam āgataṃ ta utthāya praṇipatyābhinandya ca
GP10bhp_04u:3120: BhP_04.31.005/1 svāgataṃ te surarṣe 'dya diṣṭyā no darśanaṃ gataḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3121: BhP_04.31.005/2 tava caṅkramaṇaṃ brahmann abhayāya yathā raveḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3122: BhP_04.31.006/1 yad ādiṣṭaṃ bhagavatā śivenādhokṣajena ca
GP10bhp_04u:3123: BhP_04.31.006/2 tad gṛheṣu prasaktānāṃ prāyaśaḥ kṣapitaṃ prabho
GP10bhp_04u:3124: BhP_04.31.007/1 tan naḥ pradyotayādhyātma- jñānaṃ tattvārtha-darśanam
GP10bhp_04u:3127: BhP_04.31.008/1 iti pracetasāṃ pṛṣṭo bhagavān nārado muniḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3130: BhP_04.31.009/1 taj janma tāni karmāṇi tad āyus tan mano vacaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3131: BhP_04.31.009/2 nṛṇāṃ yena hi viśvātmā sevyate harir īśvaraḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3132: BhP_04.31.010/1 kiṃ janmabhis tribhir veha śaukra-sāvitra-yājñikaiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3133: BhP_04.31.010/2 karmabhir vā trayī-proktaiḥ puṃso 'pi vibudhāyuṣā
GP10bhp_04u:3134: BhP_04.31.011/1 śrutena tapasā vā kiṃ vacobhiś citta-vṛttibhiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3135: BhP_04.31.011/2 buddhyā vā kiṃ nipuṇayā balenendriya-rādhasā
GP10bhp_04u:3136: BhP_04.31.012/1 kiṃ vā yogena sāṅkhyena nyāsa-svādhyāyayor api
GP10bhp_04u:3137: BhP_04.31.012/2 kiṃ vā śreyobhir anyaiś ca na yatrātma-prado hariḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3138: BhP_04.31.013/1 śreyasām api sarveṣām ātmā hy avadhir arthataḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3139: BhP_04.31.013/2 sarveṣām api bhūtānāṃ harir ātmātmadaḥ priyaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3140: BhP_04.31.014/1 yathā taror mūla-niṣecanena tṛpyanti tat-skandha-bhujopaśākhāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3141: BhP_04.31.014/2 prāṇopahārāc ca yathendriyāṇāṃ tathaiva sarvārhaṇam acyutejyā
GP10bhp_04u:3142: BhP_04.31.015/1 yathaiva sūryāt prabhavanti vāraḥ punaś ca tasmin praviśanti kāle
GP10bhp_04u:3143: BhP_04.31.015/2 bhūtāni bhūmau sthira-jaṅgamāni tathā harāv eva guṇa-pravāhaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3144: BhP_04.31.016/1 etat padaṃ taj jagad-ātmanaḥ paraṃ sakṛd vibhātaṃ savitur yathā prabhā
GP10bhp_04u:3146: BhP_04.31.017/1 yathā nabhasy abhra-tamaḥ-prakāśā bhavanti bhūpā na bhavanty anukramāt
GP10bhp_04u:3147: BhP_04.31.017/2 evaṃ pare brahmaṇi śaktayas tv amū rajas tamaḥ sattvam iti pravāhaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3148: BhP_04.31.018/1 tenaikam ātmānam aśeṣa-dehināṃ kālaṃ pradhānaṃ puruṣaṃ pareśam
GP10bhp_04u:3149: BhP_04.31.018/2 sva-tejasā dhvasta-guṇa-pravāham ātmaika-bhāvena bhajadhvam addhā
GP10bhp_04u:3150: BhP_04.31.019/1 dayayā sarva-bhūteṣu santuṣṭyā yena kena vā
GP10bhp_04u:3151: BhP_04.31.019/2 sarvendriyopaśāntyā ca tuṣyaty āśu janārdanaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3153: BhP_04.31.020/2 nija-jana-vaśa-gatvam ātmano 'yan na sarati chidravad akṣaraḥ satāṃ hi
GP10bhp_04u:3154: BhP_04.31.021/1 na bhajati kumanīṣiṇāṃ sa ijyāṃ harir adhanātma-dhana-priyo rasa-jñaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3155: BhP_04.31.021/2 śruta-dhana-kula-karmaṇāṃ madair ye vidadhati pāpam akiñcaneṣu satsu
GP10bhp_04u:3156: BhP_04.31.022/1 śriyam anucaratīṃ tad-arthinaś ca dvipada-patīn vibudhāṃś ca yat sva-pūrṇaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3157: BhP_04.31.022/2 na bhajati nija-bhṛtya-varga-tantraḥ katham amum udvisṛjet pumān kṛta-jñaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3159: BhP_04.31.023/1 iti pracetaso rājann anyāś ca bhagavat-kathāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3160: BhP_04.31.023/2 śrāvayitvā brahma-lokaṃ yayau svāyambhuvo muniḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3162: BhP_04.31.024/2 harer niśamya tat-pādaṃ dhyāyantas tad-gatiṃ yayuḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3163: BhP_04.31.025/1 etat te 'bhihitaṃ kṣattar yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛṣṭavān
GP10bhp_04u:3168: BhP_04.31.027/1 yo nāradād ātma-vidyām adhigamya punar mahīm
GP10bhp_04u:3169: BhP_04.31.027/2 bhuktvā vibhajya putrebhya aiśvaraṃ samagāt padam
GP10bhp_04u:3170: BhP_04.31.028/1 imāṃ tu kauṣāraviṇopavarṇitāṃ kṣattā niśamyājita-vāda-sat-kathām
GP10bhp_04u:3171: BhP_04.31.028/2 pravṛddha-bhāvo 'śru-kalākulo muner dadhāra mūrdhnā caraṇaṃ hṛdā hareḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3173: BhP_04.31.029/1 so 'yam adya mahā-yogin bhavatā karuṇātmanā
GP10bhp_04u:3174: BhP_04.31.029/2 darśitas tamasaḥ pāro yatrākiñcana-go hariḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3176: BhP_04.31.030/1 ity ānamya tam āmantrya viduro gajasāhvayam
GP10bhp_04u:3177: BhP_04.31.030/2 svānāṃ didṛkṣuḥ prayayau jñātīnāṃ nirvṛtāśayaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:3178: BhP_04.31.031/1 etad yaḥ śṛṇuyād rājan rājñāṃ hary-arpitātmanām
GP10bhp_04u:3179: BhP_04.31.031/2 āyur dhanaṃ yaśaḥ svasti gatim aiśvaryam āpnuyāt
